SA18jsphustu:3_1: saddharmasacchiṣyagaṇān samastān namāmi buddhān bahuśaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ //
SA18jsphustu:4_1: bodhyaṅgamārgaphalitaṃ hi jinālijuṣṭaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca śubhakalpataruṃ namāmi //
SA18jsphustu:6_0: tatra prāyeṇa hi santo gurviṣṭadevatāṃ pūjayitvā kriyāyāṃ pravartante puṇyaprasavārtha,
SA18jsphustu:6_2: ahamapi ca sadācāro 'yamiti kṛtvā śrīghanā cārasaṃgrahārambhe svadevatānamaskāraṃ kartuṃ pravṛtta iti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:6_4: tatra trividhaḥ saṃkleśaḥ- kleśasaṃkleśaḥ karmasaṃkleśaḥ janmasaṃkleśaśca /
SA18jsphustu:6_7: aṣṭānavatiranuśayāḥ / daśa paryavasthānāni / kleśa eva [SŚ_2] saṃkleśaḥ kleśasaṃkleśaḥ kleśasvabhāvatvāt kleśasaṃkleśahetutvācca kleśasaṃkleśa ityuccate /
SA18jsphustu:6_20: ataḥ kleśakarma saṃkleśakarma saṃkleśaphalatvāt kleśasaṃkleśahetutvācca janmasaṃkleśa ityucyate /
SA18jsphustu:6_21: ata eva nirdeśo nālpīyān na ca bhūyān ratnatrayavat /
SA18jsphustu:6_23: prahīṇāḥ [paritya]ktāḥ apanītāstiraskṛtāḥ aśeṣāḥ nikhilā vāsanāsahitāḥ saṃkleśā kleśa[karma]janmākhyāyena [buddhena] bhagavatā,
SA18jsphustu:6_32: tathāpyeṣāṃ pratyekajinaśrāvakāṇāṃ balavaiśā[ra]dyādiṣu [SŚ_3] tathāgatadharmeṣu anekaloka[dhātuga]teṣu deśeṣu atītānāgatabhedabhinneṣu ca na bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:6_34: tathāgatasya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñāna[darśana]skandhamiti pṛṣṭenoktaṃ- no bhadanteti sūtrāt āryamahāmaudgalyāyanasya svamātṛjanmadeśāparijñānāt ā[rya]sāriputreṇa ca pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānāt mayūracandrakādiniṣpattikarmaviśeṣāparijñānācceti /
SA18jsphustu:6_35: ato mābhūt teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ / jñeyaṃ boddhavyaṃ parijñātavyamityanarthāntaraṃ /
SA18jsphustu:6_36: niścayena dhīyante avatiṣṭhante asmin bhāvā iti nidhirādhāraḥ /
SA18jsphustu:6_39: iha tu tatsādharmyāt yathā mahāsamudro gambhīratvāt atiduruttaratvāccāmbhonidhirucyate,
SA18jsphustu:6_40: evaṃ jñeyamapi duṣparijñānāt samastānāvedyatvena duravagāhayatvāt ambhonidhiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:6_46: tamīdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya kāyavāṅmanobhiriti śeṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:6_47: samānakartṛkayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakāle 'yaṃ ktvā vidhīyate prāṇamyeti /
SA18jsphustu:6_48: yathā snātvā bhuṃkta iti / ataḥ pṛcchayate kaṃ praṇamya kiṃ kariṣyasītyāha- śrāmaṇerāṇāmācāraḥ saṃgrahīṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:6_50: [SŚ_4] athavā śrāmaṇyamamalo mārgaḥ tamīranti gacchantīti śrāmaṇerāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:6_54: nanu ca evaṃ sati granthasyācāratvaṃ na prāpnoti kriyārūpatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:6_55: naiṣa doṣaḥ / ācārapratipādako 'pi grantha ācāra ucyata iti upacārāt jātakamālāvat kaṃsavadhavat /
SA18jsphustu:6_60: ācāraṃ saṃgrahīṣyāmīti / saṃkṣepato 'smin śloke buddhasya bhagavataḥ prahāṇasaṃpat jñānasaṃpat,
SA18jsphustu:6_61: trailokya śāstṛtvaṃ, aviparītaśāsanakāraṇañca paridīpitaṃ prahīṇāśeṣasaṃkleśaśabdena jñeyāmbhonidhipāragaśabdena ca /
SA18jsphustu:9_1: śaraṇaṃ bhavediti vistaraḥ / nanu cācāraḥ saṃgrahīṣyata iti anantarābhidhānādācāraḥ saṃgrahītavyaḥ kasmāt śaraṇagamanādikamucyate? yadyapyetacchrāmaṇerāṇāmityanantaraṃ prakṛtaṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāmācāraḥ saṃgrahīṣyata iti /
SA18jsphustu:9_2: te ca śrāmaṇerā daśaśikṣā padaparigṛhītā eva prādhānyenābhipretāḥ,
SA18jsphustu:9_3: na gṛhiṇaḥ / sa eṣa śrāmaṇeramāvaḥ teṣāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ kathaṃ bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:9_5: ato yathoddeśaḥ tathā nirdeśa iti nyāyāt śrāmaṇerabhāva eva tāvadādau vaktavya ityāha /
SA18jsphustu:9_6: śaraṇaṃ gatavāniti ślokaḥ / tatra trāṇārthaḥ śaraṇārthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:10_0: bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca /
SA18jsphustu:11_0: iti gāthāvacanāt / gatavāniti prayātavān / buddhamiti / yathā dinakarakarodayādāpāditasakalakarṇikārapramuditadvirephavṛndaparipīyamānakamalaṣaṇḍo buddha ityucyate,
SA18jsphustu:13_1: athavā yaḥ puruṣo vyapanītanidraḥ suptotthito vibuddha ityucyate /
SA18jsphustu:13_2: evaṃ bhagavānapi saṃsāramahāśayanādutthitaḥ ajñānanidrāpagamāt bauddhasya jñānasya sākṣātkaraṇādbuddha ityucyate /
SA18jsphustu:14_1: yo vibuddhaḥ sa vai buddho vibuddhapuruṣo yathā // iti /
SA18jsphustu:15_1: anuttareṇa jñānena budhyate vā śivamiti buddhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:15_2: sa ca trividhena dharmasāmbhogikena nairmāṇikena ca vyavasthita iti anyatra śāstrāntare nirdiṣṭamiti granthagauravaparihārārthamiti iha nābhidhīyate /
SA18jsphustu:15_8: eṣa dvividhaḥ dharmaḥ / saṃghamiti / catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ catvāraḥ phalāptāḥ abhedyatvena saṃghagatatvāt aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ saṃgha ityucyante /
SA18jsphustu:15_9: katame punaste aṣṭau? yaduta strotāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ strotāpannakaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:16_1: bhettuṃ na śakyate yasmāt tasmāt saṃgho 'bhidhī(ya)te // iti /
SA18jsphustu:17_0: atastaṃ buddhaṃ dharma saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ yo ga[ta]vāniti yāvadeṣaḥ śrāmaṇero munermata [SŚ_7] iti anena padena saṃbandhanīyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:17_3: atha kimarthamādau pañcaśikṣāpadāni na grāhyante śaraṇagama[nā]didānataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:17_6: ato yadi na pañcaśikṣāpadāni ādau na grāhyante na trīṇi śaraṇagamanādīni pradīyante,
SA18jsphustu:17_9: śikṣāpañcakamādāyeti / śikṣaṇaṃ śikṣā / pravṛttinivṛttyātmake śīle vā pratipattirācaraṇaṃ samādānataḥ śīle sammukhīkaraṇamiti yo 'rthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:17_14: ādāyeti gṛhītvā / kiṃ yo 'nupravrajito jinaṃ? ya iti yaḥ puruṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:17_16: kaṃ pratītyāha / jinaṃ / jitakleśatvājjinaḥ / jitātmapāpakā dharmāstenopagaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:17_17: jinoktamiti śratervacanāt / buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitaṃ anupravrajāmīti yo vācamudīrayatītyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:18_2: steyaṃ cauryaṃ, maithunaṃ abrahmacaryaṃ, anṛtavākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ / vadhaśca steyañca maithunaṃ cānṛtavākyaṃ ceti vadhasteyamaithunānṛtavākyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:18_3: ataḥ kiṃ tasya, kiṃ virata iti paurastyena padena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:18_4: kimetasmādeva yo virataḥ saṃvarī bhaṇyate? netyāha /
SA18jsphustu:18_7: maireyaṃ dravyāsavaḥ / te ca kadācit aprāptamadyasadbhāve bhavata iti /
SA18jsphustu:19_7: gandhamālyā[dyā]diti / gandhyata iti gandho ta ityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:19_13: vikālāśanata iti / atra sūryodayādāramya yāvat keśamātrāna tītako madhyāhnakālaśabdenābhidhīyate /
SA18jsphustu:19_14: vigataḥ sa īdṛgvidhaḥ kālo yasyāparāhṇādeḥ sa vikālaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:19_16: tasmādvikālāśanādityarthaḥ / tatheti / tathāśabdena yo virataḥ iti saṃbadhyate /
SA18jsphustu:19_17: rukmarūpyagrahācceti / rukmaṃ suvarṇa, rūpyaṃ rajataṃ, tayorgrahaṇaṃ rūkmarūpyagrahaṇa /
SA18jsphustu:19_20: yaḥ prāṇātipā[tā]dvirataḥ yāvajjātarūparaja taparigrahāt sa eṣaḥ śrāmaṇero [SŚ_9] munermataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:19_22: yadyapi sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ kāyavākcittamaunato muniriti sāmānyavācinā muniśabdenābhidhīyante,
SA18jsphustu:19_26: śākyaśabdalopaṃ vā kṛtvā idaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ mu narmata iti /
SA18jsphustu:19_27: yathā satyabhāmābhāmeti / saṃkṣepatastaduktaṃ bhavati- ratnatraye śaraṇaṃ gatvā pañcaśikṣāpadāni parigṛhyabuddha bhagavantaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmīti vācamuccārya prāṇātipātādvirato yāvat jātarūparajataparigrahācca sa eṣa śrāmaṇero munermataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:22_4: tacca kaścit pradeśo 'pi saṃbhavati ityataḥ sakalagrahaṇaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:22_5: tena sakalena śarīreṇa sarveṇa prakāreṇa kāyenetyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:22_9: na hanyānna mārayet / kamityāha / prāṇinaṃ / prāṇonāma vāyuḥ, so 'syāstīti prāṇī / sa ca kiṃ viśiṣṭa eva? pañcaśākhādi nirvṛttaḥ parigṛhayate /
SA18jsphustu:22_11: prāṇiśabdena ca manuṣyagatiparyāyaḥ eva gṛhayate na prāṇimātraṃ,
SA18jsphustu:22_13: jātivācī vāyaṃ śabdaḥ / tena strīpuruṣapaṇḍakaṃ pañcaśākhādi[nir]vṛttaṃ mārayataḥ syādeva saṃvaratyāgaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:22_14: anena ślokena kāyiko vikramaḥ pratiṣiddho bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:23_1: mṛtyorvarṇamityādi / mṛtyurjīvitendriyanirodhaḥ / tasya varṇaḥ praśaṃsā, taṃ na bhāṣeta / na vadedityarthaḥ / kṛtapuṇyo bhavān, udyānayātrā tava paralokagamanamiti śrutvā kaścidātmāna hanyāt /
SA18jsphustu:23_2: tadidānīṃ atra duṣkṛtapūrvakaḥ saṃvaratyāga iti pratiṣidhyate /
SA18jsphustu:23_3: mṛtyorvarṇa na bhāṣayet, śastrahāraṃ na caiṣayediti / śastraṃ harati vahatīti vā śastrahāro vadhyaghātakaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:24_1: pūrvoktaparyāyavyatirekai ranyairapi prayogairmārayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti pratipādayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:24_3: tatra virekaṃ grastanaṃ, vamanaṃ chardanaṃ / ālepena varṇānyathātve sati vinaśyati /
SA18jsphustu:24_4: viṣaṃ jātimaṃ kṛtrimañca, śastraṃ kuliśādi / virekaśca vamanaṃ cālepanaṃ cetyādi dvandvaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:24_6: tāṃ na kuryāt / kimartha? prāṇighātāya manuṣyavadhārthaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:24_9: kecit garbhaśātananimittaṃ virekādikaṃ na kuryāditi nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti /
SA18jsphustu:25_0: na kevalaṃ amunā prayogeṇa mārayituṃ na labhyate maraṇanimittamātramapi kartuṃ na sulabhyata iti pratipādayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:25_2: nimittaṃ liṅgaṃ na kuryāt / ko na kuryādityāha / vratī / kaiḥ? svapnolūkādivāśitaiḥ / svapna iti pañca svapnāḥ / svapnālīkānantācīrṇā satyākhyaṃ svapnapañcakamiti vacanāt /
SA18jsphustu:25_3: ulūkādīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ, vāśitāni ruditāni / svapnāśca ulūkādivāśitāni cetyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:25_7: dauḥśīlaṃ śīlaviratiḥ prakṛtisāvadyāt prajñaptisāvadyāt bhagavatā pratiṣiddhādvikālabhojanādeḥ duḥkhatāpopa śamanādapratisārā dinā prahlāditvena śītalatvācchīlaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:25_8: sukhaṃ śīlasamādānaṃ kāyo na paritapyata iti gāthāvacanāt /
SA18jsphustu:25_10: phalāni catvāri srotāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ arhatphalaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:26_0: vadhakenāpi cittena bhrāntyā mārayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo na bhavatī ti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:26_3: atasteṣu madhyapaścātpurogeṣu manuṣyeṣu gacchatsu yatraiva vadhakaṃ manaḥ yasminneva puruṣe vadhakacittaṃ tameva puruṣaṃ dhnato mārayataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:26_4: asyeti śrāmaṇerasya / hiṃsā prāṇivadhaḥ / nānyaṃ tasmātpuruṣādanyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhrāntyā mārayataḥ asya hiṃsā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:26_5: ka evamāha / ityato bravīti / āha sarvavit / sarvaṃ vettīti sarvavit, bhagavān buddhaḥ / sa evamāhetyanenāptāgamaṃ darśayati /
SA18jsphustu:27_0: anyadapi prayogāntaraṃ na kāryaṃ māraṇāyeti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:27_1: kūṭetyādi / kūṭamiti pāśaṃ varṇayanti / avamārthamiti pāśayantraṃ / avaṣṭambhamiti yantrameva, yena sahasākramya hanyāt / avapayamiti avapātaṃ varṇayanti /
SA18jsphustu:27_4: tāmavapayañca kiṃ na kuryāt? māraṇāya śarīriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ / anyathā tu na doṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:30_1: mṛtyuhetoḥ sthānopadeśamātramapi kartuṃ na labhyate iti darśayitumāha /
SA18jsphustu:30_2: taskaretyādi / taskaraḥ cauraḥ / ahiḥ sarpaḥ / senā yuddhāya ekatra sannipātaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:30_3: śeṣaṃ sugamaṃ / caurādibhyo bhayaṃ yatra yasmin mārge pathi bhavati tasya panthānaṃ dehināṃ prāṇināṃ nāśāya vināśārthaṃ yatirna kathayet /
SA18jsphustu:31_0: viṣamanadīpratāraṇamapi tartuṃ na kalpayati tamiti darśayitumāha /
SA18jsphustu:31_3: teṣāṃ bhayaṃ / yatra yasyā nadyāḥ tīrthe bhayaṃ bhavet tattīrthaṃ na prakāśayet /
SA18jsphustu:32_0: kiñca rājñā vā yatra ghātyate tanmārgaṃ na prakāśayediti daṇḍādidānapratiṣedhopāyena paraṃ ghātayituṃ na kṣamata iti darśayitumāha /
SA18jsphustu:32_1: kiñcidbhūpataya ityādi / bhūḥ pṛthvī, tāṃ pālayatīti bhapatiḥ rājā /
SA18jsphustu:32_4: varaṃ jīvitaṃ tyajeti / jīvitaparityāgaṃ varaṃ kuru tvamityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:32_5: ityevaṃ samucitaṃ pratyāyādānārtha pratibaddhasya puruṣa syāntike 'yuktaṃ ayuktarūpaṃ vacanaṃ na vadedityeke /
SA18jsphustu:32_7: ā / samantāt sarvatra kārye niyuktaḥ ityāyuktaḥ vyāpṛtaka ucyate,
SA18jsphustu:32_8: tenāyuktena baddhaḥ saṃruddha yo 'nyaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmin baddhāyukte puruṣe ityevaṃ na vadet /
SA18jsphustu:32_9: varaṃ mriyasva mā tvaṃ kiñcit dravyaṃ rājñe dehīti /
SA18jsphustu:32_10: anyathā hi yaḥ saruddho vyāpṛtakaḥ tasmin baddhāyukta ityevaṃ na vadedityarthaḥ pūrvavat /
SA18jsphustu:32_11: anyathā varaṃ mriyasva mā tvaṃ kiñcidayuktāya dehi ityuktaṃ syāt /
SA18jsphustu:32_12: na bhūpataya iti niyuktairnānyasya puruṣasya baddhatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:33_0: sabhayaṃ layanaṃ vadhakacittenopadeṣṭuṃ na kalpata iti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:33_1: bhujagetyādi / atra vihāraśabdena layanamevocyate viharantyasminniti kṛtvā /
SA18jsphustu:33_2: / [SŚ_14] yasmin layane sarpādibhayaṃ bhavati tadvadhakābhi prāyeṇāgantukāyabhikṣave noddiśet /
SA18jsphustu:33_3: ya uddiśati tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati asati maraṇe,
SA18jsphustu:34_1: vyāghrādivyapadeśenetyādi / yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ śaṭhajātīyaḥ vyāghraṃ hanmīti vyapadeśaṃ kṛtvā śatruṃ hanyāt sa vihārād ghaṭṭanīyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:35_1: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā na jovedekāpyariḥ śatruriti /
SA18jsphustu:35_2: evamarīn śatrūn / yatiḥ / adharmyā na kriyā, adhārmikakriyākāro na kāryaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:35_3: saṃsmṛtya krakacopama iti / krakacena karayantreṇa upamā yasmin mṛte tadevamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:35_4: tattu saṃsmṛtya kiṃ? adhārmikakriyākāro na kārya iti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:36_1: vadhā ityādi / eko dvau trayo vāpi ye śrāmaṇerā vadhīkṛtā māraṇābhiprāyato /
SA18jsphustu:36_2: yugapadekakālaṃ / tat prayoga iti / ghātayituṃ / śrāmaṇerasya prayogeṇa manuṣyaṃ mārayati,
SA18jsphustu:37_4: kadācidupakramaṃ karoti nṛsaṃjñānavati na tvasau manuṣya ityāha /
SA18jsphustu:37_5: nara iti / yadyasau manuṣyo bhavati / kadācidetāni trīṇyaṅgāni saṃbhavanti,
SA18jsphustu:37_6: na vadhakacetaneti / ato vadhakacetanāvacanaṃ / kadācidupakramaḥ prajñāyate, nṛsaṃjñā vadhakace[ta]nāvān ca naro bhavate,
SA18jsphustu:37_8: ata āha / jīvitasya kṣayaśceti / tadupakrama ityekamaṅgaṃ, nṛsaṃjñā ceti dvitīyamaṅgaṃ, nara iti tṛtīyamaṅgaṃ, vadhakacetaneti caturthamaṅgaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:37_9: jīvitakṣayaśceti pañca[mama]ṅgaṃ ityetāni pañcāṅgāni nṛghātane manuṣyavadhe veditavyāni /
SA18jsphustu:37_10: kecittu mandadhiyaḥ prāhuḥ / nare vadhakacetaneti saptamyantaṃ paṭhanti /
SA18jsphustu:37_11: teṣāṃ pañcāṅgāni na siddhyanti nare vadhakacetanetyasya padasyaikāṅgatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:37_13: eṣa hi vinaye nirdeśaḥ / prāṇī ca bhavati, prāṇisaṃjñī ca bhavati, vadhakacittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:37_14: upakramañca karoti, jīvitā dravyaparopito bhavati iyatā prāṇātipātī bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:37_15: atra ca prāṇī bhavati ityādi sarvaḥ prathamānto nirdeśaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:37_16: tathā kārikāntareṇāpi upakrama iti nṛsaṃjñāvadhakacetaneti prathamāntanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:38_0: viṣaśastrādiprayogeṇāpi mārayituṃ na nirdiśyata iti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:38_1: śrāmaṇeretyādi / yadviṣaśastrādi yatinā prayuktaṃ narasya nāśāya,
SA18jsphustu:38_2: yadi tenaiva prayogeṇa naro mriyate tadāsau prayoktāsaṃvarī saṃvarādbhraśyate /
SA18jsphustu:39_3: vinayajño 'pi cānusmaraṇāt / ādiśabdena dveṣābhibhavāt / avakrītādeḥ saṃvaratyāgo [na] bhavatīti matvā naraṃ mārayet /
SA18jsphustu:39_5: nonmattādikaḥ / unmattavikṣiptacetasastu śrāmaṇerā mārayanto na dauḥ śīlyabhājo bhavanti smṛterabhāvāt /
SA18jsphustu:40_1: kāyetyādinā / kaṃ ruṇaddhīti karuṇā / tasyāṃ bhavāḥ kāruṇikāḥ / tathā hi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:40_2: taiḥ kāruṇikaiḥ maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ manaḥ karma prāṇiṣu sattveṣu sarvadā sarvasmin kāle kartavyaṃ yatinā śrāmaṇereṇeti /
SA18jsphustu:40_3: evamuktamabhihitaṃ / yasmāt yataḥ kāraṇāt / asmādanantaroktāddhetoḥ kimityāha /
SA18jsphustu:40_5: sattvānāṃ pīḍāṃ na kuryāt / kairityāha / dārurajjvayaścarmabandhanaiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:40_6: tatra dāru kāṣṭhaṃ / rajju guṇamayī kriyā / ayo lohaḥ / carma vadadhrī / teṣāṃ bandhanāni atastaiḥ / analo 'gniḥ / jalañcānalaśca jalānalau / tatra nimajjajjalaṃ jalānalapraveśaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:41_0: kṛmigorūpetyādi / kṛmigīrūpādīnāṃ vihiṃsanaṃ mithyājīvaśca karṣaṇe sati yasmāt kāraṇāt bhavati tasmāddhetoḥ karṣaṇa dūrādeva tyajet /
SA18jsphustu:42_1: nāṅkayedomahiṣyādi / gomahiṣyādirnāṅkayitavyo, na cāsya gomahiṣyādernāsikāṃ vedhayet,
SA18jsphustu:43_1: vyaparopya tasya māṃsena yadvyañjanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat bhakṣayato yateḥ śrāmaṇerasya yasmānnighṛṇaṃ niṣkṛpaṃ cittaṃ jāyate /
SA18jsphustu:43_2: ataḥ kadācit uddiśya kṛtaṃ bhakṣayan lobhānalenāpūryamāṇaḥ prāṇivadhamapi kuryāt iti hiṃsā yasya saṃbhāvyate /
SA18jsphustu:44_2: abhrāntimatā nirīkṣitena śrutena śaṅkitena vā taduddiśya kṛtaṃ boddhavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:45_0: āśaṅkāmadhikṛtyāha / gṛhābaddhetyādi / gṛhābaddhā ye pakṣimṛgaśūkarādayaḥ teṣāṃ yat pakṣaśṛṅgādi [tad]darśanāt- kimete mṛgapakṣiśūkarādayo mamoddiśya hatā na veti āśaṅkā utpadyate /
SA18jsphustu:45_1: satyāmāśaṅkāyāṃ dānapatiḥ praṣṭavyaḥ- kimete mamoddiśya hatā na veti /
SA18jsphustu:45_2: pṛṣṭo dātetyādi / yadidaṃ dānapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sannevaṃ vadet- tvannimittaṃ tavārthe 'mī mṛgādayo hatā iti /
SA18jsphustu:45_3: evaṃ sati tasmin gṛhe na bhuñjīta /
SA18jsphustu:45_5: virataḥ prāṇināṃ vadhādityanena gṛhītaśikṣasyāyaṃ pratiṣedho netarasyeti darśayati /
SA18jsphustu:45_6: śyenakādihatā vetyādi / atha sa dānapatirevaṃ [SŚ_18] kuryāt /
SA18jsphustu:45_9: mātāpitroryajñasya kṛte hatā ityevaṃ sati doṣāsti nāśnatāṃ /
SA18jsphustu:45_10: evaṃ dātari bruvāṇe sati bhuñjānānāṃ na kaściddoṣo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:46_0: ekaṃ śrīghanamuddiśyetyādi / yadyekaṃ śrāmaṇeramārabhya kṛtaṃ matsyādikaṃ māsaṃ vyañjanaṃ tadanyeṣāmapi śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ yatīnāṃ bhogāya na kalpate /
SA18jsphustu:46_1: bhikṣubhikṣuṇyopāsakopāsikānāṃ samuddiśya kṛtañca yattadapi paribhogāya na kalpate /
SA18jsphustu:47_0: nādeyādi jalamityādi / nadyāmbhavaṃ nādeyaṃ / kiṃ tat? jalaṃ / ādiśabdena tāḍāgādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:47_3: ko na pibedityāha / vratī / jānanniti vacanāt / ajñāne na doṣaḥ / nātra jantuśabdena matsyādayaḥ parigṛhyante teṣāṃ vivecanakṣamatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:47_5: jantavaḥ prāṇinaḥ / sūkṣmāḥ adṛśyāḥ / atrāsmin śikṣāpadematāḥ abhipretāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:47_6: yathā katama ityāha / trasikormiṅkarādayaḥ / urmikara ityevamādaya iti yāvat /
SA18jsphustu:47_7: atha kimarthamiyaṃ kārikā pṛthak vyavasthāpyate? yāvatā vṛkṣasekagurusnānaṃ kuryānnāśuddhavāriṇā ityasyāṃ kārikāyāṃ saprāṇakena vṛkṣasekādipratiṣedhādayamapi kāryo 'vagata eva /
SA18jsphustu:47_8: yatra hi sekaḥ pratiṣidhyate sutarāṃ tatra pānapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:47_10: na atra mukhākāreṇa māraṇābhiprāyo 'sti pātukāmatāyāḥ prādhānyāt /
SA18jsphustu:48_0: vārītyādi / jalaṃ pāvayituṃ dharmakaraṅkaṃ khallakasahitaṃ sthāpayet /
SA18jsphustu:49_0: divyanetretyādi / divi bhavaṃ divyaṃ / kiṃ tat? netraṃ cakṣuḥ / divye netre yasya sa divyanetraḥ /
SA18jsphustu:49_3: kiṃ tanneṣṭamityāha / jalapratyavekṣaṇaṃ / yuktaṃ tāvat andhasya jalapratyavekṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ sāmarthyābhāvāt /
SA18jsphustu:49_4: atha divyanetrasya kasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ? sa hi pṛthivyāśritānapi prāṇakān sūkṣmāntarakārūpikān paśyati /
SA18jsphustu:49_6: bhadantaḥ prajñāsiṃha āha- divyacakṣuṣaḥ kumataya ityucyante /
SA18jsphustu:49_8: ataḥ pratiṣedhakaraṇamiti / nanu cāndhasya jalapratyavekṣā sāmarthyābhāvādeva na bhaviṣyati,
SA18jsphustu:49_9: kimanena pratiṣedhena prayojanaṃ? prasannākṣasya darśanasaṃbhavāt pratiṣedhamiti vinayavido varṇayanti /
SA18jsphustu:50_1: hastetyādi / hastasyāṅguṣṭhāgre āvartā sūkṣmarekhā tāṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa [ta]thoktaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:50_2: tasya na nivāryate / anivāryamiti yāvat / anenaiva timirikāṇāṃ pratiṣe[dha]yanti /
SA18jsphustu:51_0: tena hastapaścimakāvartadarśinā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ pratyavekṣaṇīyamiti āha /
SA18jsphustu:51_1: [SŚ_20] locanasyetyādi / locanasyākṣṇorvibhramo mā bhūditi kṛtvā ciraṃ bahukālaṃ na [pa]śyet na nirīkṣayet /
SA18jsphustu:51_2: neti pratiṣedhaḥ / taditi jalaṃ / cirapratiṣedhādeva pratyavekṣaṇī[yaṃ] ityāha /
SA18jsphustu:51_4: māyā paravañcanā / śāṭhayañcittakauṭilyaṃ yena tathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti asphuṭaṃ pratipadya /
SA18jsphustu:51_6: ataḥ tābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ / saṃkalpamātrakaraṇāya nāsyaivaṃ pratyavekṣaṇīyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:51_8: yenāntareṇetyādi / yāvat kālāntareṇa ṣaṣṭyabdaḥ ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ kuñjaro hastī paribhramyate /
SA18jsphustu:51_9: śakaṭaṃ vā vaṃśapūrṇaṃ yāvatā kālena kālāntareṇa bhramati,
SA18jsphustu:51_10: sa īdṛgvidhakāla ityarthaḥ / salilekṣaṇe jalapratyavekṣaṇe veditavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:52_0: ūrdhvetyādi / ūrdhvā ca adharā ca madhyamā ca ūrdhvādhomadhyamāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:52_1: tistraḥ kiṃ? bhūmayaḥ / kasya? salilasya / śuddhimāyāti yā yā bhūriti / āsāṃ tisṛṇāmapi bhūmīnāṃ madhye yā yā bhūḥ śuddhimāyāti niḥ prāṇakā bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:53_0: yatra ityādi / yasyāṃ nadyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ vā,
SA18jsphustu:53_1: sthūlā mahāntaḥ prāṇakā karatalahatāḥ hastena hatāḥ santaḥ adhaḥ sthalaṃ yānti tatra jalaṃ grahītavyaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:53_2: na cet srāvayitavyamiti / cecchabdo yadyarthe / yadi karatalāhatāḥ santaḥ prāṇino 'dho [na] yānti tadā srāvayitavyaṃ tadudakaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:53_4: bhaveyuru[da]kamityādi / yasminnudake prāṇinaḥ kare lagnā uttiṣṭhanti na tatra pāṇipādāsyavastrādikaṃ kṣālayedyatiriti /
SA18jsphustu:54_0: kule ityādi // kule yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ bhojanāya nimantritaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:54_1: tena tatra gatvā praṣṭavyaṃ- kimatra jalaṃ srāvitaṃ na veti /
SA18jsphustu:54_3: yadi pṛṣṭaḥ san dānapatiḥ bravīti na srāvitamiti,
SA18jsphustu:54_4: tadā saṃjñiko vācyaḥ / saṃjñāsyāstīti saṃjñikaḥ, sa viśiṣṭa eva gṛhyate / yaḥ srāvaṇāya kuśalaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:54_6: itaro na tu / yaḥ stha[vi]rataraḥ parisrāvayituṃ na jānāti,
SA18jsphustu:55_0: yadi tathaiko 'pi srāvaṇāya kuśalo na bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:55_1: tadā kiṃ kartavyaṃ ityāha / kintu snāvyamiti vistaraḥ / srāvyāt parisrāvaṇāt / sajantukajalamātmīyapātre muktvā kutaḥ punaretadudakamānītamiti pṛṣṭaṃ yataḥ puṣkariṇyāderānītaṃ tatraiva muñcetsvayamiti /
SA18jsphustu:55_2: mā bhūdanyatra kṣāraṃ nīramupaghātakṛtaṃ prāṇināmiti tatraivetyāha /
SA18jsphustu:55_3: saptāhaṃ vetyādi / athavā yatra sapta divasān pānīyamavatiṣṭhati tatra tat saprāṇakamudakaṃ moktavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:55_5: kīdṛgvidha ityāha / tadaśuṣyati / tat pānīyaṃ tatra śoṣaṃ nopaiti /
SA18jsphustu:55_7: kecittadaśuṣyati tatra pānīyāśoṣaṇaṃ nimittamiti nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti /
SA18jsphustu:55_8: pravṛṣṭetyādi / athavā sutarāṃ deve vṛṣṭe / kīdṛśe? svacchanīraughavāhini /
SA18jsphustu:55_9: svacchamanāvilaṃ, nīraughaṃ jalaughaṃ voḍhuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhāvaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:55_10: svacchanīraughavāhī / tasminnīdṛgvidhe vṛṣṭe sati tāni [sa]prāṇakāni jalāni nimnagānāṃ patiṃ mahāsamudrapātaṅgacchateti uktvā visarjayet /
SA18jsphustu:55_12: tadā tat saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ kiṃ kartavyamityāha /
SA18jsphustu:55_14: vaktraṃ mukhaṃ dīrghaṃ yasyā rajjudvayena ca [SŚ_22] baddhā ghaṭikā sā evamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:55_15: tayā dūragatādhvagena udake kūpe adhastāttadudakaṃ muñcet /
SA18jsphustu:56_1: ghaṭikātritayamiti / tisro ghaṭikāḥ pratyavekṣya mārgageṇa udapānataḥ kūpāt jalaṃ pātavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:56_3: kiṃ tarhi sarvāstāḥ pariśuddhāścet peyaṃ? cecchabdo yadyarthe /
SA18jsphustu:56_6: tat srāvyamanyatheti / kathamanyathā? yadi tāstisro ghaṭikā na śudhyanti,
SA18jsphustu:56_8: ghaṭikātritayaṃ vīkṣyeti / ghaṭikā tritayasthamudakaṃ / stokastokena salilaṃ pratyavekṣyetyeke /
SA18jsphustu:56_10: etadeva tu yujyate, yatopyūrdhvādhomadhyamāstisraḥ salilasyāpi bhūmayaḥ iti kārikāyāṃ stokaṃ pratyavekṣitavyamiti yuktaṃ na ca tatra sarvaṃ śikṣāpadañcedaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:56_14: iha tu śakyatvāt sarvamiti / evaṃ tarhyaśakyatvāt tatrāpratyavekṣaṇamevāstu /
SA18jsphustu:58_0: na rajjughaṭiketyādi / rajjuśca ghaṭikā ca rajjughaṭike tayo rdānaṃ parityāgaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:58_1: tanna śastaṃ nābhimataṃ / kutretyāha / saprāṇake jale / saha prāṇakena vartata iti saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:58_2: tasmin / kiṃ tadeva na śastaṃ? netyāha /
SA18jsphustu:58_4: tatsaprāṇakamudakaṃ parasmai pibeti vaktuṃ dātuṃ vā na jātu kadācit yatiḥ kṣamate /
SA18jsphustu:58_6: kiṃ tena saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi ityapi na vaktavyamityāha /
SA18jsphustu:58_7: sajantukamityādi / iyaṃ puṣkariṇī sarittaḍāgādi saprāṇakamiti pareṣāmuccaiḥ śabdairna vadet /
SA18jsphustu:58_8: atha yadi kaścit pṛcchati, kimidaṃ, prativacanaṃ dadyāt, saprāṇakamiti, taḍāgādi / tadā kuru kāryaṃ na veti samīkṣyeti /
SA18jsphustu:58_9: pṛṣṭaḥ prativadet parān pratyavekṣya jala kṛtyaṃ kuru /
SA18jsphustu:58_10: ityevaṃ sati pṛṣṭaḥ san paraṃ yatirvadet /
SA18jsphustu:58_15: kiṃ tarhi upādhyāya ityādi / saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi na veti sphuṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:59_0: evaṃ tarhyātmanaḥ saprāṇakajalapānapratiṣedhāt pareṣāñca dānapratiṣedhāt vṛkṣādīnāmacetanānāṃ saprāṇakenodakena sekānnadānaṃ na nirudhyate /
SA18jsphustu:59_2: vṛkṣasekamityādi / apariśuddhena jalena vṛkṣaseko na dātavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:59_3: [SŚ_24] upādhyāyācāryāṇāmapi snānaṃ na kāryamiti anena bāhyabhogo nivāritaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:60_0: kiṃ punarjalameva saprāṇakamokṛtaṃ dātraṃ vakraṃ na kuryāt,
SA18jsphustu:60_5: maṇḍo 'nnavikāraḥ / daṇḍāhataṃ mathitaṃ / tadevamādikaṃ saprāṇakaṃ yatirna pibet,
SA18jsphustu:61_0: samatkuṇa ityādi / saha matkuṇairvattate yacchayanaṃ tadātape na śoṣa yat /
SA18jsphustu:61_1: hime kardame śotavāriṇi uṣṇavāriṇi vā [na] kṣipet /
SA18jsphustu:62_0: navakarmetyādi / caityārāmavihārādīnāṃ navakarma sajantukenodakena na yatiḥ kuryāt /
SA18jsphustu:62_2: srāvayitvā tadudakaṃ dināntaṃ na sakalaṃ divasaṃ trikoṇakaṃ khallakaṃ dhāryaṃ dhārayitavyamityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:62_3: kintu kālena kālaṃ parisrāvaṇaṃ moktavyaṃ prāṇakānāṃ pīḍāparihārārthaṃ duṣkṛtaparihārārthañceti /
SA18jsphustu:63_3: kimiti / vadhāna tvaṃ trikoṇakamiti / bhṛtaka, khallakaṃ bandha, kūpādevamudakamutkṣipya evaṃ srāvaya,
SA18jsphustu:64_3: tadā yāvatsaptapuṭake[na] khallakena srāvyaṃ tadambhaḥ pānīyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:64_4: athaivamapi na śudhyati, tadā pratikūpikā kāryā / yadi sā na śudhyeta, tadā navakarma tyaktvā deśāntaraṃ gantavya /
SA18jsphustu:65_2: ete hi kuṇarūpiṇaḥ prāṇakāḥ abhūtvā saṃbhavanti,
SA18jsphustu:65_3: bhūtvā ca paścādvinaśyanti / yadā tāvadamī prāṇakā bhūtvā bhavāntaraṃ janmāntaraṃ yānti,
SA18jsphustu:65_5: kena? yathokta vidhikāriṇā / yathoktamācāravidhiṃ kartuṃ śīlamasyeti yathoktavidhikārī /
SA18jsphustu:66_0: satpaṭetyādi / śobhanaḥ paṭaḥ satpaṭaḥ / tenābaddhaṃ yanmañcapīṭhasaṃsthānaṃ dhāraṇapātrakaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:66_2: ucchīdanti uchrayeṇa catvāryaṅgulāni yasya mañcādeḥ tasmāt nadyādau salilaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:66_4: etaduktaṃ bhavati- nadītaḍāgādiṣu mañcapīṭhasaṃsthānaṃ dhāraṇapātraṃ ghanena paṭenāveṣṭaya madhye tu upalādikaṃ datvā udake nimajya caturāṅgulamucchritaṃ kṛtvā tadantargatamudakaṃ pratyavekṣya jalakāryaṃ kāryamiti /
SA18jsphustu:67_0: chidrakarṇadvayetyādi / chidrite kāṣṭhamaye karṇadvaye āsaktaṃ baddhaṃ yatsūtraṃ,
SA18jsphustu:67_2: tena baddhaṃ dvidaṇḍake daṇḍakadvaye yaddhāraṇapātrakaṃ tattathoktaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:67_3: [SŚ_26] tadīdṛgvidhaṃ dhāraṇapātrakaṃ trikoṇakasya khallakasya bahirheṣṭhaṃ dadhyāt /
SA18jsphustu:68_1: kṛpayā karuṇayā parītaḥ samantāt idaṃ gṛhīta cittaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:68_2: tena kṛpāvatā śrīghanena svādu mṛṣṭaṃ vāri pānīyaṃ sajantukaṃ saprāṇakaṃ kṣārembhasi kṣārīye jale na moktavyaṃ notsraṣṭavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:68_3: yastu niṣkṛpo muñcati tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:68_4: anāpatmṛṣṭasaṃjñinaḥ / yastu kṣārīye jale mṛṣṭasaṃjñī mṛṣṭābhiprāyastasya anāpat /
SA18jsphustu:69_0: tatra sakalena śarīreṇetyārabhya yāvadavakrītādirityetaiḥ kārikāntarairduṣkṛta pūrvakaḥ saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:72_0: sphuṭārthāyāṃ śroghanācārasaṃgrahaṭīkāyāṃ prāṇivadhaviratiśikṣāpadaṃ nāma prathamaṃ samāptaṃ //
SA18jsphustu:73_5: kālikamityādi / kālaśabdenātra prayuktaṃ / mabhyavahāraparibhoge na kṣamate vratīti,
SA18jsphustu:73_8: sakṛtparigṛhītaṃ saptāhaṃ kṣamate śrī[gha]nasya bhikṣoriti sāptāhikaṃ ghṛtādi /
SA18jsphustu:73_12: anyadgurudravyaṃ na bhavati sāṃghikasyaiva gurudravyatvena vivakṣitatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:73_14: na tu punaḥ pinvitumiti / ataḥ kalpyākalpyaṃ muktāphalādi /
SA18jsphustu:73_16: tadevaṃ kālikaṃ yāvadakalpikaṃ dravyaṃ nādadīta parasvakamiti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:74_0: uktā aṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ / ṣoḍaśamidānīmucyante / pṛthivyudaketi vistaraḥ / pṛthivī codakaṃ cetyādi dvandvaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:74_6: nādadīteti na gṛhṇīyāt / parasvakamiti paradravyaṃ / ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiśca dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:74_7: yadevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhireva dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahe siddhe kimarthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthagucyante kālikādīni? satyametat /
SA18jsphustu:74_8: kintu tebhya eva ṣoḍaśebhyo dravyebhyo niṣkṛṣya kālikāditvamasāṃkaryeṇa pratipādanārthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthaṅnirdiśyante /
SA18jsphustu:74_13: yathodaṣṭau? satyametat / kintu aṣṭau ṣoḍaśeti saṃkhyānupaurvavidhānārthamaṣṭau pūrvamuktāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:74_14: ayaṃ saṃkṣepārthaḥ / pṛthivyādīnaṣṭau pariṣkārān nādadīta na gṛhṇīyāditi /
SA18jsphustu:75_0: uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ / kiyatpramāṇa[ma]sya punaḥ dravyasyāpaharaṇātsaṃvaratyāgo bhavatītyāha /
SA18jsphustu:75_3: tasya yaścaturtho bhāgaḥ kākinīnyūnāḥ pañca māṣakāḥ,
SA18jsphustu:75_4: tān haran / athavā tadarghaṃ tanmūlyaṃ dhanaṃ śāṭakādi[s]teyacittaḥ cauryābhiprāyaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ haran sthānāt cyāvayan svīkurvan anyairyatibhirlaghu [SŚ_29] śīghraṃ nāśanīyo,
SA18jsphustu:76_0: uktaṃ dravyasya pramāṇaṃ / kutaḥ punaḥ sthānāttaddravyamapaharannaśrāmaṇero bhavatītyāha /
SA18jsphustu:76_1: yadi vāṭeti vistaraḥ / caturvāṭāntarāvasthite hastini hriyamāṇe yadi tatra vṛhaddvārā vāṭā bhavanti,
SA18jsphustu:76_2: tadā caturbhiḥ pādaiścyute gaje ayatiḥ bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:76_3: atha saṃvṛtā dvārā, tadā niṣkrānte sati dvipahṛtsyāt /
SA18jsphustu:76_5: taṃ haratīti dvipahṛt, hasticauro bhavedityarthaḥ / evamanayā kārikayā sthānadvayaṃ pratipādita vistīrṇadvāre pādau sthānamityekaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:77_0: gulphetyādi / gulphaṃ pādasya parva / tatrābaddhaṃ yadikṣudaṇḍādi, tasmin / kīdṛgvidhe? dūrākṛṣṭe dūranīte /
SA18jsphustu:77_3: pañjarād gajavadvije iti / yathā vṛhaddvāravāṭāyāṃ gajasya pādacyutimātreṇa saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ svalpadvārāyāñca niṣkrānte sati,
SA18jsphustu:77_4: evaṃ pañjare 'pi vṛhaddvāre pādacyutimātreṇa svalpadvāre niṣkrānte pakṣiṇi sati yatiḥ dvijahṛtsyāditi /
SA18jsphustu:77_6: gulphopanibandhanaṃ sthānaṃ, vṛhaddvāre pañjare pādau sthānaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:78_1: saṃdeśaṃ kasyacinnayati / tatra yadyekasmādaṅgādanyasminnaṅge śirasi vā tatsaṃdeśadraviṇaṃ [SŚ_30] dravyaṃ sañcārayet stainyacittena saṃvaradhūtaṃ samāpnute,
SA18jsphustu:79_0: mṛto 'sau yasyetyādi / yasmin pudgalāyaṇādhitame dravyamamukena pudgalenāsau mṛta ityevaṃ manyatānyasmādadhvagāt brahmacāriṇaḥ sakāśācchratvā sīmānte sthātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tasmai bhāgamadatvā gṛhṇan yatirayatirbhavet,
SA18jsphustu:79_1: aśrāmaṇero bhavatīti yāvat / atrāpi śarīrāṅgameva sthānaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:80_0: atha mṛtasya śrāmaṇerasya taddravyaṃ tatkasya prāpnotītyāha /
SA18jsphustu:80_1: yadvittamityādi // mṛtasya yaterathavārhataḥ parinirvṛtasya yaddravyaṃ tatsarvamupādhyāyasya prāpnotītyevaṃ jagaumuniḥ,
SA18jsphustu:81_2: tatra harturiṣṭāmabhipretāṃ diśaṃ yadi hastī yāyāt,
SA18jsphustu:81_6: tasmin karipe / kīdṛgvidhe? hṛtasaṃjñini / hṛto hastī mameti saṃjñā yasya tasmin hṛtasaṃjñini karipe sati asau hartā vratī cauraḥ syādaśrāmaṇero bhavatīti /
SA18jsphustu:81_8: anabhimatā dik, upacāraḥ, paripanthi cittaṃ ceti catvāri sthānāni nirdiṣṭāni /
SA18jsphustu:82_3: avanau pṛthivyāṃ yā cyutiḥ pātaḥ asyāḥ cyutau satyāṃ bhraśyate /
SA18jsphustu:82_4: kutaḥ? saṃvarāt / saṃvarīti śeṣaḥ / bodhivṛkṣādapi aṃśukaṃ vastraṃ gṛhṇan ayatirbhavati /
SA18jsphustu:82_6: ubhayānta[yo]rbandhaḥ, manasā paraparigraho, vastraṃ ceti / tatra kīlakabaddhāyāṃ cīvaramālāyāṃ ubhayāntasthānaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:82_7: yadā anyonyāparijñānādubhau corayataścīvaramālāyā antadvayaṃ muñcatastadā parasparaparigrahaḥ sthānaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:83_0: kṣiptetyādi // kṣiptāni prakīrṇāni mauktikahārādīni yasmin mahākule tadevamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:83_1: tatra gato yatiḥ sahāye jāte sati tasyaiva sahāyasya hastāyāṃ prasevikāyāṃ tataḥ kulāt prakīrṇamauktikahārādi gṛhītvā nyasati /
SA18jsphustu:83_2: tannyastaṃ tenaiva sahāyena hārayan kiṃ saṃvaracyutiriti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:83_3: jaṭālenetyādi / athavā jaṭālena lomaśena śunā kurkureṇa tanmahākulāt taṃ mauktikahārādikaṃ hārayan upalāpya vatsaṃ tṛṇādinā gokāyapotakaṃ haran kiṃ saṃvaracyutiḥ? kiṃ punaḥ [SŚ_32] pādacyutimātreṇaiva saṃvaratyāgo bhavati? netyāha /
SA18jsphustu:84_1: etān ete gāvo hariṣyantīti atra pūrvavadādiśet,
SA18jsphustu:84_3: tadevamādibhistisṛbhiḥ kārikābhirupacāraścittaṃ ca śakaṭādiṣu tatsaṃjñitvaṃ mamatvalābhaśca sthānamuktaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:85_5: atha kuṭilaḥ kīlako bhavatīti bandhanañca śithilaṃ bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:85_7: vakratvena kīlakasya śithilatvena bandhasya kīlakasthānānatikramaṃ darśayati /
SA18jsphustu:85_9: yadā tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:86_1: kṣaudraṃ madhu, tailaṃ tilatailādi, jalaṃ nādeyādi haran yatiryadi pūrārpyataṅgataṃ bhavet,
SA18jsphustu:86_3: ayatirbhavatītyarthaḥ / avicchinnāyāṃ tu dhārāyāṃ yadi śrāmaṇyāpekṣayā nivartate,
SA18jsphustu:87_2: tayā lipsayā ekasya bhrāturbhāgāt yadi bālamātramapi bhūmi haret tadā kṣatasaṃvarī bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:88_1: atha kiṃ cauragṛhītaṃ pātrādi tyaktāśayasya śanaiḥ punargṛhītuṃ labhyate? netyāha taskaretyādi /
SA18jsphustu:88_2: taskareṇa caureṇa upāttaṃ gṛhītaṃ yatpātrādi taṃ nirāśaḥ san yatiḥ punarbhūyaḥ ādadat gṛhṇan saṃvarād bhraśyata iti /
SA18jsphustu:88_3: saṃvaraṇaṃ savaraḥ / akuśalaśrotasa āvaraṇaṃ / tato hīyate / itarastu anyaktāśaḥ punargṛhṇan nāpadaṃ prāpnoti,
SA18jsphustu:88_4: ayatirnabhavatītyarthaḥ / kiṃ punastattaskaropāttaṃ pātrādi gopālādidattaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? temityāha /
SA18jsphustu:88_5: mitretyādi / yadi taccauragṛhītaṃ pātraṃ mitrabhāvena labdhaṃ bhavet mahatā vā kārpaṇyena gopālādibhirvā dattaṃ syāt,
SA18jsphustu:89_0: yadi caurāḥ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na dadate,
SA18jsphustu:89_2: bhayetyādi / pātrasya cīvarasya ca muktaye teṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ bhayopadarśanaṃ kārya /
SA18jsphustu:89_3: yatra tu rājani teṣāṃ malimlucāṃ bandhanādikaṃ bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:89_4: tatra gatvā na vaktavya mebhiścauraiḥ vayaṃ muṣitā iti /
SA18jsphustu:90_0: niṣkāsayasītyādi / etau yatī kriyākāraṃ kurvāṇāvanyonyaṃ prayājayataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:90_1: upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ yatpātracīvaraṃ tvaṃ niṣkāsayasi tadāvayostava ca mama ca /
SA18jsphustu:90_3: tadā dvāvapi tau vratinau taskarau bhavataḥ /
SA18jsphustu:91_0: atha yadā bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerāḥ saṃbhūya kākinīnyūnān pañca māṣakānapahareyustadā kiṃ te saṃvariṇo bhavantyuta neti? asaṃvariṇa eva bhavantyekābhiprāyatvāt [SŚ_34] sarve dvāri sthitacellakavat /
SA18jsphustu:91_1: dāsyāma ityādi / ete yataya ekābhiprāyā mahallakena saha kriyākāraṃ kurvata /
SA18jsphustu:91_2: mahallaka, samaṃ tava bhāgaṃ dāsyāmaḥ, kevalaṃ dvāre tiṣṭha vaya caurikāṃ kariṣyāma iti /
SA18jsphustu:91_3: evaṃ pratijānanāsya / uktaṃ karotītyuktakṛt / tasyoktakṛto mahallakasya tulyāpattiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:92_0: uṣitvetyādi / kaścidāgantuko yatiḥ uṣitvā, nivāsaṃ kalpayitvā pātracīvaraṃ vismṛtya gacchati /
SA18jsphustu:92_1: tasminnāgantuke gate āgatyāgatya yo yatiḥ tatpātracīvara gāpayetsa caurā bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:92_2: evamāvāsikāḥ sarvetyādi / amunānantaroktena prayogeṇa yadi sarve āvāsikāstadāgantukasya pātramapa[ha]reyustadā sava kṣatasaṃvarā bhavanti /
SA18jsphustu:92_3: yasya tu tatpātracīvaraṃ, sa yadi saṃsmṛtya nayati na kilviṣī /
SA18jsphustu:92_4: kilviṣamucyate pāpaṃ / tadasyāstī[ti] kilviṣo / na kilviṣī anāpattikaḥ syāditi yāvat /
SA18jsphustu:93_0: anyasyetyādi / yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ steyacittenānyasya yateḥ pātramanyena yatinā ānāyayati,
SA18jsphustu:93_1: sa doṣavān bhavati, ayatirbhavatītyarthaḥ / yastvānetā tasyaivaṃvidhā buddhiretatpātraṃ asyaivānāyayituryaterityevaṃ sati na doṣo,
SA18jsphustu:93_4: teṣāṃ vinā sahaśabdena [SŚ_35] tṛtīyaryava sahārthasya dyātitatvāt sahaśabdagrahaṇamatiricyate /
SA18jsphustu:93_5: na vā sahārtha iyaṃ tṛtīyā kartari vighānāt /
SA18jsphustu:94_0: yāvata pūjetyādi / yāvat munerbuddhasya bhagavataḥ pūjā kriyate tāvat saṃghasyāpi pūjāsatkāraḥ pravartate ityevaṃ matvā yaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ stainyacittena stūpāya dadāti,
SA18jsphustu:94_1: staupikaṃ vā lābhaṃ saṃghāya dadāti sa kṣatasaṃvaro bhavatyayatirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:94_2: nanu ca yāḥ kāścitsaṃpadaḥ sarvāstā bhagavantamāgamyati /
SA18jsphustu:94_4: naitadasti / etadeva hi vidāraṇaṃ stainyacittasyotthāpakaṃ yathā kāruṇyena salilamapaharata iti /
SA18jsphustu:95_0: kiṃ punaḥ sāṃghikātkośāt stūpasyoddhārakaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? nemityāha /
SA18jsphustu:95_1: likhitveti vistaraḥ / savārikairvā pakṣavārike māsavārāvārikairvā sāṃghikātkośāt likhitvoddhārakaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:95_3: saṃghācca stūpasyetyarthaḥ / taiśca vārikaiḥ karmādānaparisamāptau vaktavyaṃ- iyat hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇādi staupikāt kāśādagṛhītaṃ sāṃghikācca iyaditi /
SA18jsphustu:95_4: noktakṛto 'nyatheti / kathamanyathā? yadi vinā likhitvoddhārakaṃ gṛhṇanti,
SA18jsphustu:95_5: māsaniṣkāse ca na vadanti, tadā noktakṛto bhavanti / uktaṃ na kurvantīti noktakṛto,
SA18jsphustu:96_2: svakīryo 'śaḥ svāṃśaḥ / tena mukto yaḥ parakīryo 'śaḥ taṃ haratīti svāṃśamuktaharaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:96_4: etau yatī ekatra kule lābhaṃ labhete /
SA18jsphustu:96_5: tayordvayormadhye yaḥ parabhāgaharaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ sa cauro bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:96_6: viśvāsaṃ tu punardāsyāmīti ca kṛtvā gṛhṇan nāpadaṃ prāpnoti /
SA18jsphustu:96_7: labhase tvamityādi / etau yatī kriyākāra kurvāte /
SA18jsphustu:96_8: yaṃ tvaṃ lābhaṃ labhase ahañca yaṃ lābha labhe tadāvayostava ca mama ca vaditvaivaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā samutpanne lābhe sati yastaṃ kriyākāraṃ bhinati tatordhena taskaro bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:97_0: dakṣiṇādeśanepyevamityādi / yathā dvayoḥ kulopakayorekasya kriyākāraṃ bhindataḥ saṃvaracyutiruktā,
SA18jsphustu:97_3: dvayośca pāṃśukūlikayormadhye pāṃśukūle samutpanne sati yaḥ kriyākāraṃ bhinatti sa cyutasaṃvaro bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:98_0: prāṅnirdiṣṭaḥ sāṃghiko lābhaḥ stūpāya na dātavyaḥ staupikaśca saṃghāyeti /
SA18jsphustu:98_1: anyasmai sutarāṃ dātuṃ na labhyata ityabhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ vidhiṃ darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:98_2: upakārītyādi / upakartu śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te upakāriṇo,
SA18jsphustu:98_4: ke punaste ityāha / vihārasvāmi rājādayaḥ upakāriṇaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:99_0: śrīghanebhyopītyādi / yadi cellakāḥ sāṃghike vihāre ālepanaṃ saṃmārja[nā]dikaṃ kurvanti tadā tebhyaḥ saṃghataḥ pādāsyaṅsa pūrvāhṇikādi dātavyamanyathā neti /
SA18jsphustu:99_1: apiśabdena na kevalamupakāryapakāriṇo jñātavyāḥ śrīghanebhyo 'pyevaṃvidhakarmakāribhya iti [SŚ_37] darśayati /
SA18jsphustu:99_2: nanu ca śrāmaṇerasya pravraji[ta]tvādvināpi vihāralepanādikaraṇena sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo labhyata eva /
SA18jsphustu:99_4: idameva āśaṃvayamāne kṛte tricīvareṇa vibhūṣitasya hi bhikṣoḥ sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo 'nujñāto bhagavatā sūtre,
SA18jsphustu:99_5: na śrāmaṇarasya ato vighā[nā]ntaramāha bhagavān- śrīghanebhyo 'pīti /
SA18jsphustu:100_0: sīmāntasthāyina ityādi / sīmāntarāle syātuṃ śolaṃ yasya yatestasmai bhikṣusahitāya bhikṣūṇāyupasyātakāriṇe taṇḍulādikaṃ datvā dārakaprasyavyājena taṇḍulādikaṃ yatirgṛhṇīyāt /
SA18jsphustu:100_2: sīmāntasthāyine adatveti vātrākāraḥ praśliṣṭāstāti matvaivaṃ vyāvakṣate /
SA18jsphustu:100_3: sīmāntapātine yataye taṇḍulādikamadatvā dārakaprasthavyapadeśena taṇḍulādi na grāhyamiti tadatrobhayasmin pāṭhe na doṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:101_0: atyaktāśa ityādi / atyaktā pātrādi pratyāśā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:101_1: svapātracīvaraṃ naṣṭamiti / na kenacidapahṛtaṃ kintu kathañcit pramādācchoritaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:101_3: matvaivamiti / kathamevaṃ matvā? atyaktāśasya matvā naṣṭaṃ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate,
SA18jsphustu:101_4: netarasya / evaṃ gṛddho yatiḥ kīdṛśa ityāha naṣṭapātrādiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:101_6: āśāṃ naiva tyajediti / [SŚ_38] yatraiva naṣṭapātrādi lapsye,
SA18jsphustu:101_8: yastu nirāśībhūtaḥ pātra cīvaraṃ naṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāti,
SA18jsphustu:101_9: tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati, na saṃvaratyāgo / na hi tena caurāt praticaurikā kṛtānapahṛtatvāddravyasya /
SA18jsphustu:102_1: svādhyāyetyādi / ete śrāmaṇerā saṃghaśīlakaṃ kṛtvā kriyākāraṃ kurvanti /
SA18jsphustu:102_2: svādhyāyamadhyayanamuddeśaṃ vā kariṣyāma ityevaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā ye kriyākāraṃ na pratipālayanti,
SA18jsphustu:102_3: te jinoditalaṃghinaḥ / jinena buddhena bhagavatā ya uditaḥ ukto vinayastaṃ laṃghituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te jinoditalaṃghino,
SA18jsphustu:102_5: tadanena sarvatraivaṃ dhārmika kriyākārātikrame duṣkṛtaṃ bhavatītyākhyātaṃ bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:103_0: patāketyādi / yatinā dhvajāpatākādilakṣaṇaḥ stūpato na grahītavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:103_4: yatra tu stūpe devalakaḥ āste tasmādgṛhṇataḥ syādeva saṃvaratyāgaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:103_5: anilena vātena tu uddhṛtaṃ kaṃpitaṃ pātitaṃ ca yatpatākādi tatpāṃśukalamiti kṛtvā gahītavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:104_2: tatra kṛtya prayojanaṃ / kintu tasmāt sthānāducitadānāpradānārtha yatparadravyanayanaṃ tadarthaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyaṃ yatiḥ svayaṃ na nayet,
SA18jsphustu:104_3: nāpi pareṇa nāyayet / śulkaṃ yatpradānaṃ tasya ca mokṣārthamupāyaṃ nopadiśet- amunā mārgeṇa gaccha,
SA18jsphustu:104_5: ratnaṃ datvetyādi / kaścicchaṭhakajātīyo vaṇi[ja]kaḥ śulkapradānamuktaye śulkātprāgyatibhyo yathāvṛddhikayā ratnaṃ datvā paścāt [SŚ_39] śulkakarayayativāhyakṛtākaṇḍikayā tadratnaṃ mārgayatoti ca /
SA18jsphustu:104_8: tasmin aparijñāte tairyatibhiḥ- evaṃ nāma tvaṃ mohapuruṣa,
SA18jsphustu:104_9: asmākaṃ visaṃvādayasītyevaṃ suṣṭhuparibhāṣya tadratnaṃ tasyaiva vaṇijā dātavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:104_10: nāsti śulkamityādi / munerbuddhasya bhagavataḥ śulkaṃ nāsti /
SA18jsphustu:104_13: tasmin pāribhogike dravye muneriva vratināṃ śulka nāsti /
SA18jsphustu:104_14: anyatrāstītyuktaṃ bhavati / ata evāha / krayavikrayakṛddadyāditi / krayavikrayaṃ karotīti krayavikrayakṛdyatiḥ śulkaṃ prayacchet /
SA18jsphustu:105_0: varṣāvāsiketyādi / yatra grāme nagare vā yaḥ śrāmaṇero varṣāmupagataḥ,
SA18jsphustu:105_2: jīvitasya brahmacaryasya ca yayoḥ śrāmaṇerayornāśaḥ tayorapi varṣāvāsikalābhā dātavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:105_3: tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati- jīvitāntarāyabhayabhītaṃ brahmacaryāntarāyabhayabhītaṃ muktvā anyeṣāmavarṣoṣitānāṃ varṣāvāsikalābho na dātavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:105_4: prākprāgupagatairityādi / ye śrāmaṇerāḥ prāk śrāvaṇamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ prāgevāśvinamāsasya pratipadamārabhya varṣāvāsikayācanā kartavyā /
SA18jsphustu:105_5: ye tu paścāt bhādrapadamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ paścādeva kārtikamāse /
SA18jsphustu:105_6: yadi sarvaḥ saṃvaḥ prayamāyāmupagacchati tadā saṃghavaśena paścādupagatairapi yugapadeva varṣāvāsikalābho yācanīyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:106_2: karma kriyā karmeti kṛtvā, kriyate vā aneneti / karmaśabdenopasaṃpatkarmaivābhidhīyate /
SA18jsphustu:106_3: tena hi karmaṇā sa pudgalo bhikṣuḥ kriyate /
SA18jsphustu:106_4: vastu karma ca vastukarmaṇo, [SŚ_40] tayorjugupsā nindā, tayā yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣubhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti,
SA18jsphustu:106_5: tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo lābho dātavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:106_6: anye tvanyathā vyācakṣante / triśaraṇayācanāmārabhya yāvata kāṣāyaparidhānamidaṃ vastu,
SA18jsphustu:106_7: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmīti idaṃ karma viśiṣṭārthadyotakatvātkriyākarmeti kṛtvā /
SA18jsphustu:106_9: tayorjugupsā nindā, tayā yaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāmaṇerabhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti,
SA18jsphustu:106_10: tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo lābho dātavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:107_3: mithyādṛṣṭika ityarthaḥ / mithyādṛṣṭiśca nāstikapravṛttiḥ- nāsti mātā,
SA18jsphustu:107_4: nāsti pitā, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti /
SA18jsphustu:108_0: amuṣmai deyamityādi / amukasmai bhikṣave dātavyoyaṃ madīyo lābha ityevaṃ lābhe samutpanne sati yadi kaścidyatiḥ mriyate tadā niyatamavaśyaṃ tasmai vikalpitabhikṣave sa lābho deya iti bhagavatoktaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:108_1: deśāntaretyādi / ito deśāttraimāsamadhiṣṭhāyānyatra deśāntaragatasya yateḥ lābhaḥ kalpe mandire kalpakuṭayāṃ sthāpayitabyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:108_3: tadā tebhyaḥ prāśyādi na sāṃghikamannapānādi dātavyaṃ budhaiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:108_4: nanuca lābhaṃ nārhanti pañcaketyuktaṃ [SŚ_41] tatkimarthamidamucyate- amuṣmai deyamityādi kārikādvayaṃ? satyametat /
SA18jsphustu:108_5: kintu yadā avikalpo mriyate, anutpanne ca lābhe gacchati, avarṣoṣitavibhrāntakudṛṣṭayaśca trayaḥ pudgalāḥ yadānarthaṃ vā kurvanti,
SA18jsphustu:109_0: ācchādamityādi / ete yatayaḥ kule varṣāmupagatā bhavanti /
SA18jsphustu:109_1: tatra yadi dānapati sāmānyenaivaṃ vadet- ācchādaṃ dāsyāmi,
SA18jsphustu:109_2: cīvaraṃ dāsyāmi, cīvaramūlyaṃ dāsyāmi, ācchādamūlyaṃ dāsyāmītyebhiścaturbhiḥ śabdairutpadyate yo lābhaḥ sa samukhībhūtānāṃ prāpnoti,
SA18jsphustu:109_4: cīvaraṃ, ācchādakrayaṃ, cīvarakrayaṃ caitaiścaturbhiśca śabdairyo lābhaḥ samupajāyate,
SA18jsphustu:109_5: sa varṣoṣitānāṃ prāpnoti / yadi dāyakastadvarṣāvāsikaṃ lābha avarṣoṣitānāmapi dadāti,
SA18jsphustu:110_0: yāmika ityādi / yasmin divase bhagavānutpannaḥ anuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ tatra yo maho yā pūjā,
SA18jsphustu:110_1: sa jātisaṃbodhyādimahaḥ / tata utpanno yo lābhaḥ saṃghasya sa evamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:110_3: kālikaḥ yāmikaḥ yāvajjīvikaḥ sāptāhikaḥ mṛtapariṣkāraḥ kṣudrapariṣkāraḥ naityakaḥ akālacīvaraṃ kuṭīpratiṣṭhā jātisaṃbodhyādimahodbhavaśceti yo 'yaṃ daśaprakāro lābhaḥ sa saṃmukhībhūtānāṃ prāpnoti /
SA18jsphustu:111_2: na vikretavyaṃ, na ca paudvalikaṃ kṛtvā paribhoktavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:111_3: ye tu śrāmaṇerāḥ [SŚ_42] sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratibandhakatvena dadati,
SA18jsphustu:111_4: vikrīṇīte, paudgalikatvena vā paribhuñjateraṃ teṣāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:112_2: buddhāya vā bhagavate, saṃmukhībhūtāya vā saṃghāya tatsarvaṃ yatistatra tatropanāmayet /
SA18jsphustu:113_0: tūṣṇīṃ datvetyādi / kaściddānapatiḥ vihāramāgatya muktāphalādika datvā tūṣṇīṃ bhūto gacchet /
SA18jsphustu:113_1: tasmin tūṣṇīṃ datvā gate dānapatau sati buddhāya bhagavate muktā phalādi dātavyaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:114_0: katibhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'dattādānaṃ gṛhṇan aśrāmaṇero bhavati? āha /
SA18jsphustu:114_1: pṛthudravyamityādi / pṛthuvistīrṇaṃ / kiṃ taddravyaṃ? kākinīnyūnaṃ māṣakapañcakaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:114_3: paropāttamiti / kadāciddravyaṃ paropāttamapi sat yatiḥ paropāttasaṃjñā na bhavatītyata āha /
SA18jsphustu:114_5: kadācidetatsarvaṃ bhava[ti], na tu steyacetanetyataḥ steyacetaneti vacanaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:114_7: kadācidetadaṅgacatuṣṭayaṃ saṃbhavadapi sat taddravya sthānānna cyāvitaṃ syādityata āha /
SA18jsphustu:115_0: pañcabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato yatiradattamādadāno 'pi na cyutasaṃvaro bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:115_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhirityāha / dattasvaketyādi / dattasaṃjñā svakasaṃjñā aparopāttasaṃjñā ca vidyate yasya yateḥ sa yathokto yatiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:115_2: anyo 'pi ca svāṃśāttāvatkālikatvena ca gṛhṇan na saṃvaraṃ saṃvarī jahāti /
SA18jsphustu:116_1: ādāyādattamityādi / ādāyeti gṛhītvā / adattaṃ pu[naḥ] dravyaṃ utpluyedvadhvā khamākāśaṃ gatvā /
SA18jsphustu:116_3: āśāśabdasya dikparyāyatvāt / tatraiveti / yasmāt pratyāgataḥ punarbhūyastatropaviṣṭaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:117_1: bhṛtako vā sa ajñānāt smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkalpikasaṃjñayā vā paradravyaṃ gṛhṇan kṣatasaṃvaro bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:117_2: unmattavikṣiptacetasastu yatayaḥ parasvamādadānā api santonāpattibhājo bhavanti stainyacittābhāvāt /
SA18jsphustu:118_1: upakāryapakārimya ityārabhya yāvat tūṣṇīṃ datvetyādibhirvākyaiḥ duṣkṛtānyudāhṛtāni /
SA18jsphustu:121_2: nṛstrītyādi / nā ca strī ca paṇḍakaśceti nṛstrīpaṇḍakāsteṣāṃ yāni viṇmūtravaktrāṇi,
SA18jsphustu:121_4: tasmin aṅgajātaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ tilamātramapi prakṣipya yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ svādaṃ nigamayet sa kṣatasaṃvarā bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:122_0: manuṣyagativyatirikteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:122_2: atra kārikāpāṭhe vivādaḥ / tatraike mānuṣāmānuṣāste tu tiryañca[śca] narādaya iti pāṭha matvaivaṃ vyācakṣate /
SA18jsphustu:122_4: tena narādaya iti / nṛstrīpaṇḍakā ityarthaḥ / manuṣyagatiparyāpannāḥ, amanuṣyagatiparyāpannāstiryaggatiparyāpannāśca nṛstrīpaṇḍakā jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā avagantavyā iti /
SA18jsphustu:122_5: apare punarmānuṣā[mānuṣā]ste tu tiryañcaścāmarādaya iti pāṭhaṃ matvaivaṃ bruva[te] /
SA18jsphustu:122_6: mānuṣāmānuṣāste tviti / tacchabdenānantaraprayuktā nṛstrīpaṇḍakāḥ parigṛhyante tacchabdasyānantarābhidhāyitvāt /
SA18jsphustu:122_7: tu śabda evakārārthe / ta eva nṛstrīpaṇḍakā manuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ amanuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ tiryaggatiparigṛhītāśca pratyekaṃ jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā jñeyāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:122_8: amarādaya ityamarā devāḥ ādiśabdenānyāmapi gati grāhayati /
SA18jsphustu:122_9: ato devāsuranarakapretagatisaṃgṛhīteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:122_10: eta eva tu yujyate / anyathā hi narādaya ityanena nṛstrītareṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe tviti tacchabdagrahaṇamatiricyate /
SA18jsphustu:122_11: [SŚ_45] atha mataṃ- tacchabdena ta eva mānuṣāmānuṣāḥ saṃbadhyanta ityasaṃbaddhametat /
SA18jsphustu:122_12: na hi pratyakṣāpātteṣu śabdeṣu tacchabdaḥ prayujyata sūribhiranavasthāprasaṅgāt /
SA18jsphustu:122_13: na cāpi tacchabdena viṇmūtravaktrarandhrasya saṃbandha iti pāryate vaktuṃ,
SA18jsphustu:122_15: iha ca te tviti puṃliṅgena bahuvacanena nirdeśāt /
SA18jsphustu:122_16: atha mataṃ- viṇmatravaktrarandhraviśeṣā iti vyākhyāsyāma iti /
SA18jsphustu:122_17: yathā hi viṇmūtravaktrarandhraviśeṣāḥ strīpuruṣapaṇḍakāḥ manuṣyāmanuṣyatiryagga[ti]parigṛhītā maithunāśrayā jñeyā ityapūrvāyaṃ kriyākāra[ka]saṃbandhaḥ narādīnāmiti saṃbandhaṣaṣṭhayabhāvāt anyasyāśca gateḥ parigrahaṇāt /
SA18jsphustu:122_19: evaṃ vicārite kecidatra bruvata narādaya ityapi pāṭhe ādiśabdena strīpaṇḍakayoranya[syā]śca gateḥ parigraho bhaviṣyati /
SA18jsphustu:123_0: atra na sarvā tiryagyonirabhipretā sūkṣmaudārikatvena maithunākṣamatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:123_4: atrāntarāle yānyonyāpekṣayākṣudrikā maṃhato jātiḥ tāṃ tāṃ gacchan tasyāṃ tasyā jātau maithunamācaran vratāccyavate,
SA18jsphustu:123_5: aśrāmaṇerā bhavatītyarthaḥ / ata evādinirdeśāt hastinījāteyānyā mahattarā jātiḥ,
SA18jsphustu:123_6: kukkuṭājāteśca yānyā [SŚ_46] svalpatarā tasyāṃ vipratipadyamānasya na saṃvaratyāgaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:124_0: yatirna kevalaṃ maithunamadhyācaritaṃ na kṣamate strīdarśanādyapi na kṣamata iti pratipāda[ya]nnāha /
SA18jsphustu:124_1: raktaḥ sanniti vistaraḥ / yatiḥ saṃraktaḥ san striyaṃ na paśyet,
SA18jsphustu:124_4: na gacchet, na ca puruṣendriyaṃ nirbhujet /
SA18jsphustu:125_0: kiṃ punaḥ pāṭitāyāmapi maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati? bhavatītyāha bhittidvayetyādi /
SA18jsphustu:125_1: strīndriyādhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitāṃ koṭarikāṃ vātātapādinā śuṣkāṃ śastreṇavā pṛthak pṛthak kṛtāṃ tattailādibhiḥ klinnāṃ saṃyojyaikīkṛtya yaḥ śrāmaṇero vipratipadyate sa nāśayitavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:125_2: saṃgrahe sati / yadi sā koṭarikā sagrahamupayāti,
SA18jsphustu:126_1: tasyā adhaḥ khaṇḍe upari khaṇḍe ca vinīlādhmātikāñcavratī na vrajet /
SA18jsphustu:126_2: yā cāsthisaṅkalā pūyarudhirādibhiramyaktā tāmapi na yāyāt /
SA18jsphustu:126_3: sitāsthisaṅkaleti vistaraḥ / sitā śuklā yā asthisaṅkalā, śailamayī yā śilāyāṃ nidhātā dārumayī yā kāṣṭhamayī,
SA18jsphustu:126_4: pustamayī yā lepakṛtā / tāṃ sitāsthisaṅkalāṃ yāvatpustamayīṃ striyaṃ na gacchet /
SA18jsphustu:126_7: tasmātsadā sarvakālaṃ yo virata iti yativiśeṣaṇaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:127_1: dhyānetyādi / gataḥ prāptaḥ / dhyānamiddhagatastaṃ dhyānasamāpannaṃ nidrayābhibhūtaṃ ca vibuddhamapi śayitaṃ surāpānādinā mattaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyādinā vā vikṣiptacittaṃ rukṣayā vā vedanayā tunnaṃ vyathitaṃ yati yā kācitstrī balādgṛhītvā yateraṅgajātaṃ ātmīye 'ṅgajāte prakṣipet /
SA18jsphustu:127_3: ādimadhyetyādi / ādāvaṃgajātapraveśakāle, madhye paryavasāne ca ya āsvāda nigamayet /
SA18jsphustu:127_5: sa vihārād ghaṭṭayitavyaḥ / āsvādanābhāve tu neti / etaccādhimātramadhyamṛdurāgiṇaṃ pudgalamadhikṛtyoktamityavaseyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:128_1: nānetyādi / nānā prakārāṇāṃ vyañjanānāṃ rasānāṃ nānāvidhena yadupetaṃ samanvitaṃ śāliḥbhaktaṃ tasya paribhogaḥ tadvadāsvādanā draṣṭavyā /
SA18jsphustu:128_2: yathā śauṇḍasya mattavālakasya tailava[t] svacchasyānnāsavasya surāyāḥ pānāsvādastadvat maithunāsvādo 'vaseyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:128_3: anye anyathā vyācakṣate śuṇḍiṣu bhavaḥ śauṇḍaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:128_4: kaḥ punarasau? annāsavaḥ / kīdṛśaḥ? tailācchaḥ / tailava[t] svaccho yaḥ śoṇḍo 'nnāsavaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:128_5: tasya pānamabhyavaharaṇaṃ / tadvat kiṃ? āsvādanā jñeyeti /
SA18jsphustu:128_7: anāsvādā yuvagrīvetyādi / yathā yūnastaruṇasya grīvāyāṃ mṛtakukkurabandhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:128_8: yathā ca sukumārasya puṃsaḥ [SŚ_48] pradīptalohasparśastadvadanāsvādo vijñeyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:130_0: rāgāmanuṣyetyādi / rañjanaṃ rāgaḥ, rañjayate vāneneti cittamiti rāgaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:130_1: tena rāgādinā praguṇībhūtaṃ yadaṃgajātaṃ tacchukranirmokṣārthaṃ na kadācidapi spṛśet /
SA18jsphustu:131_1: tīvrarāgāditayā yadi śukrasya muktirbhavet tadā yatirmānasaṃ vigarhedvirūpakaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ na punarevaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
SA18jsphustu:132_0: majjetyādi / majjājātaṃ majjajaṃ śukraṃ, tasya kṣaraṇamapagamaḥ / yasya yateḥ svapne śukravinirmuktirbhavati,
SA18jsphustu:132_1: tasya doṣo na bhavati / kathaṃ punarbhavatītyāha / kāraṇamāha / svapnetyādi / pañcasvapnā vinaye uktāḥ / satyasvapno yathā bodhisattvena dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:132_2: alīkasvapno yathā dṛṣṭaḥ tathā na bhavatya'līkaṃ mṛṣeti kṛtvā,
SA18jsphustu:132_5: svapnasvapno yaḥ svapna evānyaḥ svapno dṛśyate /
SA18jsphustu:132_6: tadukta bhavati- yasya yateḥ svapne śukranirmokṣo bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:132_8: anyathā hya'nāśvāsikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syāt svapne 'pi maithunādhyācāreṇāpattiprasaṅgāt /
SA18jsphustu:133_0: rāgetyādi / rāgeṇāviṣṭaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yaccittaṃ tena rāgāviṣṭena cetasā yatirnārīṃ striyaṃ śrīghano na spṛśet /
SA18jsphustu:134_1: stanakakṣetyādi / stanau kakṣe ca oṣṭhau ca nābhiśca ūrū ca pārśve ca kukṣiśca malabhramaśceti dvandvaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:134_2: atastān stanakakṣauṣṭhanābhyūrupārśvakukṣimalabhramān yatiḥ saṃraktaḥ san na nindet,
SA18jsphustu:134_3: na nindāṃ kuryāt / na ca saṃstuyānna ca praśaṃsedityarthaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:134_4: aśobhanau tava payodharau śobhanau vā yāvadaṅgajāta iti /
SA18jsphustu:135_0: yadyadvadedityādi / yat yadvacanaṃ striyāḥ antike striyaṃ śrīghanaḥ maithunādhyācāraṃ kartukāmaḥ puruṣo bravroti yathā yatheti yena yena prakāreṇa [tat]tadvacanaṃ yatiḥ striyaṃ na vadet tathā tatheti tena tena prakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:136_1: yā strī māṃ paricarenmama paricaryāṃ kuryāt /
SA18jsphustu:136_2: kutaḥ? rahaḥ, rahasītyarthaḥ / sā agrā bhavati, śreṣṭhā bhavati / vyādhihīneti vyādhirahitā / yaśasvinīti yaśaḥ samanvitā, kīrtiyuktā / lābhinī ca bhavati / keṣāmityāha / āyurādīnāṃ / ādiśabdena varṇabalasaukhyādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:136_4: agrā bhavati sā yoṣidityevamādikaṃ vācaṃ na vadet /
SA18jsphustu:136_5: ka ityāha / śrīghanaḥ / kīdṛkṣa ityāha / rāgāgnipluṣṭamānasaḥ / rāga evāgniḥ rāgāgnirdahanātmakatvāt,
SA18jsphustu:136_6: tena pluṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ mānasaṃ ceto yasya sa evamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:137_1: strīpuruṣayoḥ saṃyogārthaṃ dautyaṃ kartuṃ na labhyata iti darśayitumāha /
SA18jsphustu:137_3: anyena paribhuktasya mātṛgna masya saṃgrahaṇamāvāhaḥ vivāhaścāvāhaśca vivāhāvāhau /
SA18jsphustu:137_4: atastayorvivāhāvāhayoḥ / vivāhanimittaṃ saṃgrahanimittañca dautyakarma na kuryāt /
SA18jsphustu:137_5: ka ityāha / śrāmaṇerakaḥ / śrāmaṇera eva śrāmaṇerakaḥ / kecittu kutsāyāṃ kanaṃ vidadhati /
SA18jsphustu:137_7: taiḥ kutsārtho darśanīyaḥ- kathaṃ kutsitosau yatiriti? dautyakarmakaraṇāditi cet,
SA18jsphustu:137_9: yaśca na kurute, sa kathaṃ kutsāmāsādayati / tasmātsvārtha evāyaṃ kaneṣṭavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:137_10: na kevalaṃ vivāhāvāhanimittaṃ dautyaṃ na kuryāttatkṣaṇamaithunādhyācāranimittamapi na kurvātāpiśabdaḥ sūcayati /
SA18jsphustu:137_12: tasmai śrāddhāyopāsakadārakāya imāṃ śrāddhāṃ upāsakadārikāṃ dāpayeyamiti /
SA18jsphustu:138_0: bījārthamityādi / garbhotpādanimittaṃ vratī gavādikaṃ na dadyāt /
SA18jsphustu:138_1: etānevāśvādīn bījārthaṃ parebhyaḥ kadācidapi na prārthayet /
SA18jsphustu:139_1: tulyametāsvityādi / bahavaḥ striyo yasya taṃ bahustrīkaṃ puruṣaṃ yatiḥ naivaṃ vadet- kimiti ekayā striyā sārdhaṃ mā tvaṃ tiṣṭha,
SA18jsphustu:141_2: pratyekabuddhetyādi / tatrātmārthaṃmekaṃ prati buddha iti pratyekabuddhaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:141_3: samyagaviparītaṃ samantāt jñeyaṃ buddhā iti saṃbuddhāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:141_4: teṣāṃ śiṣyāstacchiṣyāḥ / tacchabdenātra saṃbuddhā eva parigṛhyante,
SA18jsphustu:141_7: teṣāṃ yat jñānaṃ darśanañca tat mamāsti,
SA18jsphustu:141_8: mama saṃvidyata iti / asaṃvidyamānamapi santaṃ yaḥ śrāmaṇero mṛṣā vakti sa nāśanīyo 'śrāmaṇeratvena dhārayitavya ityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:141_9: kiṃ punarabhimānādapi yo bravīti so 'pi nāśyaḥ? netyāha /
SA18jsphustu:141_11: anyatra bhīṣmadroṇābhyāṃ sarve yodhāḥ parāṅmukhā iti anyatraśabdasya varjanārthe prayogadarśanāt /
SA18jsphustu:141_12: aprāpte uttaraviśeṣādhigame prāpto mayeti manyamānasya yā cittasyonnatiḥ sobhimānaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:141_13: tasmādabhimānādyo jñānaṃ darśanañca pra[ti]jānīte tasya saṃvaratyāgo na bhavati prāptasaṃjñitvāt /
SA18jsphustu:142_0: yaduktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ mamāstīti bruvan mithyā nāśya iti tatra katarajjñānaṃ katamacca darśanamiti na jñāyate /
SA18jsphustu:142_8: samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, samyagvāk, samyakkarmāntaḥ, samyagājīvaḥ, samyagvyāyāmaḥ, samyaksmṛtiḥ, samyaksamādhiśca / tatra bodhanaṃ bodhiravagamaḥ avabodhaḥ parijñānaṃ bodhijñānārthatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:142_10: samītya'viparītatve / tenāyaṃ vākyārtho jāyate- duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ nirvāṇābhimukhā samyagaviparītā yā bodhistajjñānamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:142_12: tatra pañcābhijñāḥ / divyaṃ cakṣuryenātidūrasūkṣmavyavahitāni rūpāṇi paśyati karatalāvasthitamivāmalakaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:142_13: divyaṃ śroto yena dūrāsannāḥ śabdā śrūyante devamanuṣyāṇāmantaśaḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi,
SA18jsphustu:142_14: paracittajñānaṃ yena parakīyān cittacaittān jānāti- sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamityādi,
SA18jsphustu:142_15: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtikṣānaṃ yenātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cābhinivṛttajātiparaṃparāḥ smarati- amutrāhaṃ evannāmā evaṃgotrāka ityādi,
SA18jsphustu:142_16: āstravakṣayajñānaṃ yenātmano jānāti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yāvannāparamitthatvamiti /
SA18jsphustu:143_1: dharmānvayādiketyādi / dharmatattvālambanaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānaṃ yena kleśān prajahāti /
SA18jsphustu:143_2: yatparasantānānugamaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedyamutpadyate yairanyaiḥ kleśaprahāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:143_3: ye pi sāṃprataṃ kurvanti kariṣyanti vā tepīdṛśameva jñānamadhigatavantau'dhigacchanti adhigamiṣyantītyetadanvayajñānaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:145_2: dharmajñānādīnāmaṅgīkaraṇe anyaṃ pūrvokto na yogya iti saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti /
SA18jsphustu:146_0: āryamlecchetyādi / āryaśabdenātrāryadeśajāḥ puruṣāḥ parigṛhyante na prahīṇakleśāḥ mlecchaśabdena ca śavarādayaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:146_1: teṣāṃ yadvacanaṃ tena lekhena deśāntarasthasya lipyā saṃmukhameva likhitvā /
SA18jsphustu:146_5: lekhādiṣvaparān bodhayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo na bhavati vākpravyāhārābhāvāt /
SA18jsphustu:147_0: vṛkṣamūletyādi // ahamekākyadvitīyo vṛkṣamūle viharāmi śūnye ca mandire gṛhe ahaṃ rame,
SA18jsphustu:147_1: mama ca yaccittaṃ tadekāgraṃ samāhitamityevamādi atīndriyaṃ vastu yatinā na vācyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:148_0: atiprasaṅganivṛttyarthamāha // buddhādīnāmiti / varṇoguṇaḥ, sa bahudhā tathā gatasya loke khyāpayitavyaḥ svaparārthasaṃpādakatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:148_1: ityapi sa bhagavān daśabhirbalaiḥ samanvāgataścaturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ tribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ mahākaruṇayā ceti /
SA18jsphustu:148_3: ātmanastu guṇaḥ kenacidapi prakāreṇa na vaktavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:148_5: pṛṣṭastu san yatiḥ parakīyaṃ guṇaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ vadettatrāpi tasya guṇavataḥ pudgalasya saṃmukhaṃ na vadet /
SA18jsphustu:149_1: yadāha brūyāttatsaṃmukhaṃ na tu [iti] vistareṇānadhigatasvabhāvamṛṣāvādalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitumanā cāryānāryavyavahārānupanyasati /
SA18jsphustu:149_2: dṛṣṭamityādinā / tatra dṛṣṭaṃ yaccakṣurvijñānenānubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ yacchotravijñātaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:149_4: apare punarāhuḥ- dṛṣṭaṃ yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ paricchinnaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:149_11: gadanniti vadan / mithyābhidhāyaka iti mṛṣāvādī syādityartha /
SA18jsphustu:150_1: vastu cetyādi ślokaḥ / vastu ca bhavati, alīkasaṃjñī ca bhavati, vinihitaṃ cittaṃ bhavati, mṛṣāvādasaṃjño bhavati, vācaṃ ca bhāṣate / etāni pañcāṅgāni yasya santi sa pañcāṅgaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_2: kaḥ punarasāvityāha / anṛtavādikaḥ / anṛtaḥ vādaḥ yasyāstīti [sa] anṛtavādikaḥ mṛṣāvādīti yorthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_3: tatra vastu ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnaṃ tathā tadastītyarthato na tu dravyatostīti,
SA18jsphustu:150_4: anyathā hyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastva'stoti jñātvā nāstīti bruvato 'nāpattiḥ syāt /
SA18jsphustu:150_5: alīkasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnādanyathā kathayāmītyeva saṃjñā ityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_6: cittaṃ vinihitaṃ bhavatīti yathā paricchinnajñeyaviparītadyotinīvāksamutthāpakaṃ [SŚ_56] cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_7: evamapi mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti atraivāntargatatvāt kasmāta pṛthagucyate /
SA18jsphustu:150_9: tasminstu satīda yathārtha paricchinnajñeyaviparītārthadyātinyā vācaḥ samutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ pṛthageva kāraṇatvenocyata iti naitasminnantarbhāvaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_10: tathā ca vinaye vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ vinidhāya citaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣata iti mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti paravañcanābhiprāya ityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_11: vitathasaṃjñino 'nyaḥ ko viśeṣa iti cet vitathasaṃjñī hayanyathārthaṃ pratipādayati na tu paraṃ vañcayati /
SA18jsphustu:150_12: tathā ca mṛṣāvāda iṣyate yathā śnigdhaste mukhavarṇa ityādinā /
SA18jsphustu:150_13: naitaduktaṃ bhavati / yo vitathasaṃjñī sa nāvaśyaṃ mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī,
SA18jsphustu:150_14: yastu mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī so 'vaśyaṃ vitathasaṃjñīti yena dvābhyāmevāṅgābhyāṃ mṛṣāvāda iṣyata iti /
SA18jsphustu:150_16: etaduktaṃ bhavati / caturaṅgavanti yāni vacāṃsi tāni mṛṣāvādavyapadeśabhāñji bhavantīti /
SA18jsphustu:150_19: catustrītyādi / pūrvamuktāni yānyaṅgāni te[bhyaḥ] varjitāni yānyaṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgato yo yatirmṛṣā vakti,
SA18jsphustu:150_22: alīkasaṃjñī cetyādi / alīkasajñitvena vastunaḥ parigrahānna pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:150_30: [SŚ_57] anyathā hi saṃkhyānupūrvī vidhānārthamekenāṅgena mṛṣāvādī bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:151_0: abhūtenetyādi / yatiḥ saṃmukhaṃ yati na codayet /
SA18jsphustu:151_1: kīdṛśo yatirityāha / dhvaṃsanacyāvanākūtaḥ / ākūto 'bhiprāyaḥ / tena dhvaṃsanābhiprāyaścodanābhiprāyaḥ yatiryati na cādayedityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:151_6: kṣudretyādi / kṣudrā laghīyasī sā āpattiḥ duṣkṛtasaṃjñitā saiva nimitta kāraṇaṃ codanāyāḥ tena kṣudrāpattinimittena /
SA18jsphustu:151_11: liṅgaṃ dehacihnaṃ / kriyā karma jīvikopāyo vṛttirityanarthāntaraṃ /
SA18jsphustu:151_14: taiḥ pratyekaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaiḥ vratī prāṇān pudgalān jihmakaraṇārthaṃ niṣpratibhānakaraṇārthaṃ na jātu kadāciccodayet /
SA18jsphustu:151_15: upakleśetyādi / tatra upakleśo jaḍimatvādi / gado vyādhiḥ / ākrośo duścaritairgarhaṇaṃ / āpattiḥ kāyavāṅmanobhirbhagavadājñāvyatikramaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:151_16: upakleśādinā vratī vratinamāśayenābhiprāyeṇa puroktena jihmaniṣpratibhānakaraṇābhiprāyeṇa brūyānnaiva kadācaneti,
SA18jsphustu:151_19: anena ca ślokadvayena codyasya pudgalasya caturvidhānyūnatoktā- jātivādena kulanyūnatā,
SA18jsphustu:154_0: yaterapratirūpatvātprakṛtisāvadyatvācca paiśunyamācarituṃ na labhyata iti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:154_1: bhedaṃ yāsyatītyādi / ayaṃ pudgalo anena pudgalena saha bhetsyati,
SA18jsphustu:154_2: mayā saha saṃvāsyatīti evaṃ matvā yatirjātyādivādena paiśunyaṃ na samācaret /
SA18jsphustu:155_0: tatra kārikātrayeṇa saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ śeṣaistu ślokaiḥ pañcāṅgāni, yasmādaduṣkṛtāni codāhṛtāni /
SA18jsphustu:159_2: yasmāt surāmaireyamadyapānaṃ pramādasya kuśaladharmānavahitatāyā āspadaṃ pratiṣṭhā,
SA18jsphustu:159_3: tasmātkāraṇādyatibhistatsurāmaireyamadyaṃ parasmai na deyaṃ na cātmanā pātavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:159_5: śvamūtravaditi / yathā śuno mūtraṃ parasmai na dīyate na cātmanā pīyate,
SA18jsphustu:159_7: na cātmanāpi peya / svamūtravadityapi pāṭhaḥ / tatraitad vyākhyānaṃ- ātmīyaprasrāvavaditi /
SA18jsphustu:160_0: tatra suretyāsava ucyate / annenānnavikāreṇa ca yā saṃcīyate,
SA18jsphustu:160_1: sā ca trividhāvagantavyā / kathaṃ kṛtvetyāha / valkalaiḥ saguḍairityādi / kācitsurā guḍasahitaiḥ valkalaiḥ saṃcīyate,
SA18jsphustu:160_2: aparā madhūnaiva kevalena / piṣṭo 'pūpaḥ, kiṇvaṃ surābījaṃ, jalaṃ toyaṃ / ebhirapi kācitsurā saṃcīyata ityetāḥ surā jñātavyāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:161_0: maireyamityādi / dhātrī āmalakīphalaṃ, ambu pānīyaṃ, dhātakī lokapratītyaiva kusumajātiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:161_1: guḍena dhātryā ambunā dhātakyā ca yatsaṃskṛtaṃ niṣpāditaṃ rasāntaraṃ tanmaireyamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:161_2: surāmaireyamadyaṃ tadyasmānmadanīyamataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi pātuṃ yatīnāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ na prakalpate,
SA18jsphustu:161_3: na labhyate / na kevalaṃ jalādivattatpātuṃ na kalpate,
SA18jsphustu:162_0: surāmaireyavyatiriktamanyadapi madanīyaṃ vastu paribhoktuṃ na labhyata iti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:162_2: na ca tasya kodravasya [SŚ_60] palāle svapet /
SA18jsphustu:162_3: madayedityādi / yaccānyatsurāmaireyavyatiriktaṃ madyavarṇagandharasaṃ pītaṃ sanmadayenmadaṃ janayet,
SA18jsphustu:162_4: tadapi na pātavyaṃ / pibato duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati / ata eva madanīyaṃ pūgaphalādi jñātvā na bhakṣaṇīyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:163_1: kodravānnaṃ ca bhuñjīta na ca syāt duṣkṛtaṃ kathaṃ //
SA18jsphustu:165_0: sphuṭārthāyāṃ śrīghanācārasaṃgrahaṭīkāyāṃ surāmaireyamadyapānaviratiśikṣāpadaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ samāptaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:166_4: tasyāṣṭau yānyaṅgulāni tatpramāṇaṃ pādakamasyeti jināṣṭāṅgulapādakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:166_8: yacchayanāsanaṃ pramāṇapuruṣahastapramāṇapādakaṃ tasmin mañce pīṭhe vā yatiḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ āsīta [u]paviśedityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:166_9: kiṃ saha śalyena? netyāha / kiṃ tarhi vinā śalye[na], śalyaṃ hitvetyarthaḥ / ataḥ pramāṇādhike mañce pīṭhe vā ya upaviśati,
SA18jsphustu:166_10: tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati / hemarūpyakṛte na tviti / suvarṇarūpyamaye tu mañce pīṭhe vā jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇepyupaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti /
SA18jsphustu:166_11: atha kimarthamidamabhidhīyate- hemarūpyakṛte neti? yāvatā kāyena pāṇipādādyairvastracchatrādinetyādi vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:166_14: satyametat / kintu kasyacidiyamāśaṅkā syāt sāṃghike rukmarūpyamaye śayanāsane upaviśato na kaściddoṣaḥ paudgalikasyaiva sparśapratiṣedhāditi /
SA18jsphustu:166_15: ata idamucyata iti / kecitparihāraṃ varṇayanti / tadetadasat, aviśeṣeṇa sāṃghikapaudgalikayorjātarūparajatayoḥ sparśapratiṣedhāt /
SA18jsphustu:167_1: tatrāpi jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇe 'pi mañce pīṭhe vā vinā pratyāstaraṇenopaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti darśayitumāha /
SA18jsphustu:167_6: kintu viṣṭaretyāha / vastretyādi / sūkṣmasya vastrasya tripuṭaṃ ghanasya vastrasya dvipuṭaṃ kambalasya ekapuṭaṃ pratyāstaraṇamiṣṭaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:167_7: abhipretamityartha / kramāditi yathākramaṃ, pratyāstaraṇasya tridvayekapuṭabhedo 'vaseya ityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:168_0: atirekaprāmāṇike sāṃghike śayanāsane yathā pratipattavyaṃ tathā darśanannāha /
SA18jsphustu:168_5: nyasya prakṣipya / kutretyāha / garteṣu / athavā suṣirapratipādeṣu prakṣipya /
SA18jsphustu:168_6: kiṃ evaṃ vratī niṣeveta sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ? śayanāsanamiti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:168_7: ṭaṃkitvā kīlakeṣu veti / athavā caturṣu kīlakeṣu tānatirekapramāṇakān pādān ṭaṃkitvā badhvā kiṃ kartavyamiti na jñāyate kriyākāra[ka]saṃbandhasya parisamāptatvāt /
SA18jsphustu:168_8: ata āha evaṃ vetyādi / amunānantaroktena krameṇa sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhajeta /
SA18jsphustu:168_10: tatrādhvago yatiḥ svapet / ādiśabdāt gṛhiśayyāsanasya grahaṇaṃ vedyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:168_11: tatrāpi gṛhiṇāṃ śayanāsane yatinā na pādau lambīyayitavyau- mā bhūjjanāvadhyānamiti /
SA18jsphustu:169_0: pravrajyāṃ prasāṇīkṛtya yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ vihāramuddeṣṭavyamiti darśayannāha /
SA18jsphustu:169_1: alpaṃ ce[di]tyādi / yadi bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerā bhavanti vihārāśca stokāstadā ekaikaṃ vi[hā]raṃ dvādaśebhyaḥ śrāmaṇerebhyo dātavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:169_3: tadā antato 'gatyā nirmuṣṭakaṃ hastamekaikasmai śrāmaṇerāya dātavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:169_4: bahutve tu viparyayāditi / kathaṃ viparyayāt? yadi bahavo vihārā bhavanti yatayaśca [stokāḥ],
SA18jsphustu:169_5: tadā ekaismai api śrāmaṇerāya bahavo vihārā dātavyāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:170_0: stokaṃ cedityādi / yadi stokaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhavati yatayaśca bahavaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:170_1: tadā tatra yo vṛddhaḥ sa mañce svapet /
SA18jsphustu:170_5: navakena tvabhyavakāśaka ityevaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanamuddeṣṭavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:171_4: paripālanaṃ saṃrakṣaṇaṃ / evamarthaṃ sāṃghika śayanāsanamuddiśyate na vyasanitayeti darśayati /
SA18jsphustu:172_1: kiṃ tarhi hīnamadhyetyādi / yadi bhūyāṃsi layanāni santi saṃvariṇaścālpīyānsastadā āgantukānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmavasthitaye layanatrayaṃ sthāpayitavyaṃ kīdṛśamityāha /
SA18jsphustu:172_3: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ layanānāṃ madhye yaduttamaṃ layanaṃ tadvṛddhāyāgantukabhikṣave uddeṣṭavyaṃ yanmadhyaṃ tattato navakāya,
SA18jsphustu:175_2: bāhuvikṣepakamityādi / dvayorbāhvorvikṣepaṇa sphoraṇaṃ kṛtvā yannartanaṃ tannṛttamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:175_6: yasmin krīḍāsthāne utsavādike gatvā vigataśokāḥ syuḥ strīpuruṣāstatkrīḍāsthānaṃ vigataśokaṃ yatirna yāyāt /
SA18jsphustu:175_7: yastu śrāmaṇero hṛṣṭaḥ san nṛ[tya]ti gāyati vāditraṃ vādagrati,
SA18jsphustu:177_3: kīdṛśo yatirityāha / vyādhiḥ saṃjāto yasyeti vyādhito,
SA18jsphustu:177_5: bhiṣagāderityāha / vaidyopadeśāt / katamena vidhinetyāha / datvetyādi / pūrvaṃ munaye buddhāya bhagavate candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ datvā paścādātmanā dhārayet /
SA18jsphustu:177_6: svasthastu yatiḥ kadācidapi candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ na dhārayet /
SA18jsphustu:178_0: na tiṣṭhedityādi / sati prakaṭe deśe candanādyanuliptagātro yatiḥ glāno 'pi sanna tiṣṭhet /
SA18jsphustu:178_4: kusumaṃ puṣpaṃ, srak mālā, tena kusumasrajamiti, puṣpamālāmityarthaḥ / kiṃ dhārayet? anenaiva vidhāneneti /
SA18jsphustu:178_7: netraduḥkhetyādi / netraduḥkhena śiraḥśūlena pūtanāgraheṇa ca rujituṃ śīlaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:179_1: haritāletyādi / haritālādicūrṇena sugandhinā vā tailena varṇārthaṃ rūpaniṣpattyarthaṃ yatiḥ vadanādikaṃ gātraṃ na marṣayet /
SA18jsphustu:180_1: yaterapratirūpatvādityādi / yasmānnṛttagītavāditraviśokadarśanaṃ gandhamālyavilepanadhāraṇañca yaterapratirūparāgakaraṃ auddhatyakaraṃ janānāñca kopakāraṇamavadhyā[na]karaṃ tasmājjinairbuddhairbhagavadbhirgarhitaṃ ninditaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:181_1: na darpaṇa ityādinā / ādarśe tailabhājane jalabhājane vā mukhaṃ na nirīkṣeta /
SA18jsphustu:181_2: kṛtagaṇḍāditvena śirovyathena śirovedhaduḥkhena gadena vyādhinā ca ya āturo glānaḥ taṃ muktvā anyena nirīkṣaṇīyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:181_3: kiñca vibhūṣaṇāyetyādi / yatiḥ maṇḍanārthamātmano mukhaṃ tailena nābhyañjayedantaśaḥ pānīyenāpi /
SA18jsphustu:181_4: śirorogetyādi / śirasi rogo vyādhiḥ, āsyaṃ mukhañca sphuṭitaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:181_5: tasmādṛte anyeneti yāvat / na kuṅkumetyādi / yatiścandanakuṅkumādicūrṇena vadanaṃ mukhaṃ na maṇḍayet /
SA18jsphustu:181_6: piṭakasya tu śamanārthaṃ tilakalāpaprabhṛtibhiḥ lepa iṣṭo 'bhipreta iti yāvat /
SA18jsphustu:181_7: yastu yatiḥ śaithilikatvādinā yathoktaṃ vidhiṃ na saṃpādayati,
SA18jsphustu:183_2: rātrerityādi / rātreranyatra divase bhagavānaśanakṛtyaṃ kurvannalpābādhatāṃ samyagajānātsma,
SA18jsphustu:183_4: kimiti / tathaiva vaḥ kāryamiti / yasmānmama rātreranyatra bhuñjānasyālparogatā babhūva,
SA18jsphustu:183_5: tasmād yuṣmābhirapi divase bhoktavyaṃ na rātrāviti /
SA18jsphustu:183_8: viṇmūtretyādi / rātrau piṇḍapātamaṭatāṃ aśucigarte mūtragarte ca pāto bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:183_9: aśvacoreṇa gocoreṇāhinā sarpeṇa ca samāgamo bhavati /
SA18jsphustu:183_10: evamapi sati ete yataya udarasya kukṣeḥ pūraṇārthaṃ rātrau naḥ asmākaṃ gṛhe piṇḍapātamaṭantīti jano 'vadhyātavān /
SA18jsphustu:183_11: janairavadhyāte 'pi te yatayaḥ divāpratyūṣasi sāyahnakāle ca piṇḍapātamaṭitumārabdhāḥ /
SA18jsphustu:183_13: sāyaṃ prātaścetyādi ślokaḥ / ete bhikṣavaḥ sāyahnakāle prātaḥ prabhāte ca sabhācatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mandireṣu gṛheṣu ca aṭanti bhramanti bhuñjate cāsatkṛtyaṃ ca kurvantīti janairavadhyātaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:183_14: atastasmātkāraṇātkimityāha / sugataḥ prāhetyādi / praśastamapunarāvṛttyā niḥśeṣaṃ vā gata iti sugataḥ,
SA18jsphustu:183_16: sa prāha, bratīti sma / kimiti / yatiḥ kāle bhuñjīta / kīdṛśe kāla ityāha / uditādityetyādi / keśamātreṇāpyanatīto 'saṃkrānto madhyāhno yenoditenādityena sa evamucyate,
SA18jsphustu:184_4: yāvajjīviketyādi / yāvajjīvikena pippalyādinā tailādinā pānakaiśca yatparivarjitaṃ tatkālikaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:184_5: kiṃ punaretadeva pañcavidhaṃ bhojanaṃ kālikamutānyadapi? anyadapītyāha /
SA18jsphustu:184_7: galake vā praveśyata ityanena nāsikayāpi yatpīyate tadapi galakenevābhyavahriyata iti,
SA18jsphustu:184_11: kukṣerupastambhakaṃ paripūrakaṃ karotīti kukṣiviṣṭabhaṃkṛt yade[ta]tsarvaṃ tatkāle ādyādityodite,
SA18jsphustu:185_4: deve varṣati yā śilā patati, tadvarṣopalakaṃ aśnīyāt, bhakṣayet / pātumicchā pipāsā pānābhilāṣaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:185_5: tenārtaḥ san himaṃ yatiḥ pibediti śeṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:186_0: kathaṃ punaḥ kalpikodakaṃ grāhyamityenaṃ vikalpya avasarīkartumāha /
SA18jsphustu:186_3: yāvatā kālena dvau hastau prakṣālyamānau sarudhirau bhavataḥ,
SA18jsphustu:186_6: māyetyādi / māyayā śāṭhyena / yukto yatistayoḥ prakṣālanaṃ na kuryāt yadi prakṛtyaiva snigdhatvagbhikṣubhavati,
SA18jsphustu:186_7: tasya snigdhatvaco yateḥ yau hastau tau saśabdau bhavataḥ,
SA18jsphustu:187_1: na dāsyathetyādi / kṣudbubhukṣā / tṛṣṇāśabdenāpi lokapratītorthaḥ pānābhilāṣa ucyate /
SA18jsphustu:187_3: yadi mahyaṃ vikāle bhoktuṃ na dāsyatha ityevaṃ yadi kaścidvirukto yatirbūyāt,
SA18jsphustu:187_4: tadā sa yatiḥ pūrṇe maṇḍakuṇḍe prakṣeptavyaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:187_6: tadā kiṃ kāryamityāha / aṣṭāsvadhautetyādi / aṣṭābhiḥ jale dhautaṃ prakṣālitaṃ yaddhānyaṃ kalpikena ca vastreṇa baddhaṃ tadanāmiṣe pātre tāmrabhājane anyatra vā prasthāpanaṃ diśeddadyādityarthaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:187_7: yadi tu taddhānyaṃ sphuṭaṃ sphuṭitaṃ vā sat glānāya pātuṃ na kalpate /
SA18jsphustu:188_1: lobhotthāpitetyādi / lobhenākuśalamūlena samutthāpitaṃ yatkāyavākkarma tena samupārjito yo vihāracīvarāhārastaṃ saviṣabhaktavadvarjayet /
SA18jsphustu:188_2: madyetyādi / madyavikrayaṇaṃ, śastravikrayaṇaṃ, viṣavikrayaṇaṃ, prāṇivikrayaṇaṃ, [SŚ_71] lākṣavikrayaṇaṃ ca vratī svayaṃ na kuryāt,
SA18jsphustu:188_3: na ca pareṇa kārayet, na ca tena madyādinā jīvikāṃ kalpayet /
SA18jsphustu:188_6: sā kuhanā matā / vastrānnapānādikasya tu lābhasya prāptyartha yā cāṭuvāditā priyavāditā,
SA18jsphustu:188_7: sā lāpanā mateti / naiṣpeṣikatvamityādi / annapānādipratilaṃbhāya yatpareṣāṃ kutsanaṃ tad naiṣpeṣikatvamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:188_8: anyadīyasya tu pātrāderyadvarṇanaṃ guṇodbhāvanaṃ lābhārthaṃ mahayametat pātrādikaṃ dadyāditi tatraimittikatvamucyate /
SA18jsphustu:188_9: lābhena lipsetyādi / alpena lābhena yadvṛddhiparyeṣaṇaṃ lābhānāṃ sā lipsetyucyate labdhumicchā lipseti arthāt /
SA18jsphustu:188_12: kiṃ vadityāha / purīṣavadaśucivadityarthaḥ / krīḍetyādi / pareṣāmapahananaṃ paropaghātaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:188_14: viṭpradigdhamivoragaṃ, aśuciliptaṃ sarpaṃ yathā vratī parivarjayet /
SA18jsphustu:188_15: vipaṇītyādi / vipaṇiḥ vaṇikpathamucyate, yasya ghaṭṭa iti prākṛtajanapratītiḥ /
SA18jsphustu:188_16: tarantyasminniti taraḥ, kṣepaṇatīrthaṃ / gulmaṃ viṭapaḥ / evamādike channaprakaṭe bhūpradeśe kiṃ tiṣṭhettatra na cellaka iti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:188_19: guru [SŚ_72] kumārikā sthale vasatā avyūḍhā āste /
SA18jsphustu:188_20: etāḥ kiṃ? dyūtakāragṛhaṃ bandhanāgāraṃ anyacca yadvandhanasthānaṃ tat agocaro 'viṣaya ākhyātaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:190_1: daśamaśikṣāpadamadhikṛtyāha / kāyetyādi / sakalena kāyena hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vastreṇa chatrādinā ca vratī rajataṃ rūpyaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:190_3: kimivetyāha / jvalitāgnivata / prajvālitadahanavaditi / anena daśamaṃ śikṣāpadamabhihitaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:191_2: tatra campū hāsyaṃ, kalahaḥ kāyakalaho vākkalahaśca /
SA18jsphustu:191_4: śeṣaṃ sugamaṃ / campūkalahetyādi dvandvaḥ / campūkalahadantakāṣṭhādanāni kriyā yasya vṛddhāntikasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:191_8: sa pūrvoktaśca kiṃ na vandyo yatinā yatiriti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:191_9: mṛtkarmetyādi / mṛṇmayakarmaṇā yo vyāpṛto 'prāptāvasaraḥ yaśca tūrṇaṃ tvaritaṃ dvitribhūmikaṃ vihāramutkasati,
SA18jsphustu:191_10: āśu śīghraṃ ca yo vrajati, yaśca pātraṃ pacati, cīvarakarmaṇā vā vyagraḥ, sa vṛddhāntiko yatiḥ dvitribhūmikaṃ vihāramuttiṣṭhan yāvat pātraṃ vā pacan kiṃ na vandyo yatinā yatiriti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:191_11: cūrṇetyādi / cūrṇakriyāyāṃ cailakriyāyāṃ vastrapātrādiśodhane ca yaḥ āsaktaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:191_13: pustakaṃ vā likhati, vācayati, so 'pi na vandyaḥ / viṭprastrāvetyādi / yaḥ śrāmaṇero varcakuṭi prastrāvakuṭiṃ vā gacchati,
SA18jsphustu:191_14: parasmai vā uddiśati, tamasi andhakāre vā tiṣṭhati,
SA18jsphustu:191_15: antarvāsaṃ vā vāsayati, uttarāsaṃgaṃ vā prāvṛṇoti, sa vṛddhāntiko yatiḥ varcakuṭiṃ gacchan yāvaduttarāsaṃgaṃ prāvṛṇvan na vandya ityanena yādṛśyāmavasthāyāmavasthito vṛddhāntiko yatirnavakena na vanditavyaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:192_1: idānīṃ tu yādṛgvidhāvasthāvasthitena navakena yatinā na vaditavyaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:192_2: tathā darśayitumāha / avaguṇṭhitetyādi / avaguṇṭhitaṃ pidhitaṃ śīrṣaṃ śiro yasya yateḥ tena samantaprāvṛtena vā yatinā kiṃ vandya iti vakṣyate /
SA18jsphustu:192_3: saha upanahā vartete pādau yasya yateḥ sa sopānatkaḥ,
SA18jsphustu:192_5: jānu ca jānu ca jānunī, tayorjānunoryā jaṃghā tasyāṃ jaṃghāyāṃ muṇḍe[na] sphoṭaṃ na dadyāt /
SA18jsphustu:192_6: kimivetyāha / avinā yathā / avirmeṣaḥ / yathā avinā meṇḍakena dvayorjānunorjaṃghāyāṃ hanyate,
SA18jsphustu:192_7: tadvadyatirapi vṛddhāntikasya yaterjaṃghāyāṃ na vandeteti yāvat /
SA18jsphustu:192_9: sopānatkena na vanditavya / kimivetyāha / ravinā yathā / ravirādityaḥ / yathāsau ravirupānahārūḍhastadvadupānahārūḍhena yatinā na vandanīyamityakārapraśleṣenāvabodhayan vakti /
SA18jsphustu:192_11: kiṃ tarhi anveṣṭavyaṃ vinaye meḍhakasyaiva dṛṣṭāntadānāt /
SA18jsphustu:193_0: vidhiṃ darśayannāha / samavasthetyādi / samavasthopaviṣṭasya yateḥ pādayugalaṃ karkaṭagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā śirasā vanditavyaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:193_1: yadā samavasthāniṣaṇṇo yatiḥ pādarogeṇa glānaḥ syāttadā vināpi karkaṭagrāhikayā vandyamānasya na doṣaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:193_3: tadānena vaktavyamāyuṣman, [SŚ_76] kati varṣosi, katamaste nikāyaḥ, kati ca tasya nikāyasya bhedāḥ,
SA18jsphustu:193_4: katamā te sāmayiketyādi / so 'pi yadi āryamahāsāṃghiko bhavati,
SA18jsphustu:195_0: dairghī haimantakī graiṣmī vārṣikī ca tathottarā /
SA18jsphustu:197_0: athārogyamiti ko 'rthaḥ? yathā vātapittaśleṣmādayaḥ kupitāḥ santo bādhanārthena rogā ityucyante,
SA18jsphustu:198_0: rāgādayo hyatitarāṃ rujayanti yasmādvātādayaśca kupitāḥ sakalaṃ janaughaṃ /
SA18jsphustu:198_1: tacchāntivāñchina parāḥ praṇateṣu tasmādārogyamastviti vaco nigadanti buddhāḥ //
SA18jsphustu:201_0: sa[ka]lairbhikṣubhiḥ śikṣākāmaiḥ vikālabhojanādikaṃ kṛtaṃ kasmādvayaṃ na kurma iti /
SA18jsphustu:201_1: āvāsakalpaḥ- amuṣmin vihāre bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ kurvanti kasmādvayamapi na kurma iti /
SA18jsphustu:201_2: deśakalpaḥ- amuṣmin deśe vārddhuṣikabhikṣavaḥ kasmādvayamapi vṛddhi na prayacchāmaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:202_1: vinaya iti / vinayante 'nena kleśā iti vinayaḥ /
SA18jsphustu:202_4: aśanavasanādau yathā pratipattavyaṃ tadupādhyāyācāryavṛddhatarebhyaḥ sakāśādyatinā śrotavyaṃ,
SA18jsphustu:203_0: śatadvayenetyādi / etadantaroktaṃ śrīghanācārasaṃgrahaṃ saṃhatya yatsukṛtaṃ kuśalakṛtaṃ tena sukṛtena karmaṇā jano lokaḥ asaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prāpnotu labhatāmityanena ślokena pariṇāmayati /
SA18jsphustu:204_2: śubhamativipulaṃ mayā yadāptaṃ bhavatu jano 'khilastu tena buddhaḥ //
SA18jsphustu:205_0: suśrīghanācārasusaṃgrahasya kṛtvā hi ṭīkāṃ yadavāpi puṇyaṃ /
